GSP33brsvbh3u:4: smṛtinyāyaśrutivirodhaparihāreṇa hi anadhyavasāyalakṣaṇamaprāmāṇyaṃ parihṛtaṃ tathāca prāmāṇye niścalīkṛte tārtīyo vicāro bhavatyanyathā tu nirbījatayā na sidhyediti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:5: avāntarasaṃgatiṃ darśayituntatra ca jīvavyatiriktāni tattvāni jīvopakaraṇānicetyuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:12: naca śrūyate tasmānna bhūtapariṣvakto raṃhatyapi tu karaṇamātrapariṣvaktaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:14: naca dehāntarārambhānyathānupapattyā bhūtapariṣvaktasya raṃhaṇakalpaneti yuktamityāha-sulabhāśca sarvatra bhūtamātrā iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:21: kartrādikārakabhāvite cāntarikṣaṃ krameṇotkrāmya dyulokaṃ praviśantyau sūkṣmabhūte
GSP33brsvbh3u:26: yathāgnihotrādhikaraṇamāhavanīya evaṃ śraddhāśabdavācyāgnihotrāhutipariṇāmāvasthārūpāḥ sūkṣmā yā āpaḥ śraddhābhāvitāstadadhikaraṇaṃ dyulokaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:28: tena hīddho 'sau dyuloko dīpyate 'taḥ samindhanātsamit tasyādityasya raśmayo dhūmā indhanādivādityādraśmīnāṃ samutthānāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:36: parjanyo vāva gautamāgniḥ parjanyo nāma vṛṣṭyupakaraṇābhimānī devatāviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:46: tasmindevā yajamānaprāṇā agnirūpāḥ somaṃ rājānaṃ juhvati tasya somasyāhutervarṣaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:47: etaduktaṃ bhavati-śraddhākhyā āpo dyulokamāhutitvena praviśya candrākāreṇa pariṇatāḥ satyo dvitīye paryāye parjanyāgnau hutā vṛṣṭitvena pariṇamanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:48: 'pṛthivī vāva gautamāgniḥ'tasya pṛthivyākhyasyāgnaiḥ saṃvatsara eva samit /
GSP33brsvbh3u:49: saṃvatsareṇa kālena hi samiddhā bhūmirvrīhyādiniṣpattaye kalpate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:51: rātrirarciḥ pṛthivyā śyāmāyā anurūpā śyāmatayā rātriragnerivānurupamarciḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:52: diśoṅgārāḥ prage rātrirūpārciḥśamane upaśāntānāṃ prasannānāṃ diśāṃ darśanāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:54: tasminnagnau śraddhāsomapariṇāmakrameṇāgatā apo vṛṣṭirūpeṇa pariṇatā devā juhvati tasyā āhuterannaṃ vrīhiyavādi bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:56: vācā khalvayaṃ tālvādyaṣṭasthānasthitayā varṇapadavākyābhivyaktikrameṇārthajātaṃ prakāśayan samidhyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:62: tā evāpaḥ śraddhādipariṇāmakrameṇāgatāḥ vrīhyādirūpeḥ pariṇatā satyaḥ puruṣe 'gnau hutāstāsāṃ pariṇāmo retaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:63: yoṣā vāva gautamāgniḥ tasyā upastha eva samit /
GSP33brsvbh3u:64: tena hi sā putrādyutpādanāya samidhyate yadupamantrayate sa dhūmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:65: strīsaṃbhavādupamantraṇasya lomāni vā dhūmaḥ yonirarciḥ lohitatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:69: tasminnetasminnagnau devā reto juhvati tasyā āhutergarbhaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:70: evaṃ śraddhāsomavarṣānnaretohavanakrameṇa yoṣāgniṃ prāpyāpo garbhākhyā bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:72: yataḥ pañcamyāmāhutāvāpaḥ puruṣavacaso bhavanti tasmādadbhiḥ pariveṣṭito jīvo rahatīti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:73: etaduktaṃ bhavati-śraddhāśabdavācyā āpa ityagre vakṣyati tāsāṃ trivṛtkatatayā tejo 'nnāvinābhāvenābgrahaṇena tejonnayorapi saṃgraha ityetadapi vakṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:74: yadyapyetāvatāpi bhūtaveṣṭitasya jīvasya raṃhaṇaṃ nāvagamyate tejovannānāṃ pañcamyāmāhutau puruṣavacastvamātraśravaṇāt,
GSP33brsvbh3u:76: somo rāṭ'iti śrutyā saha 'śraddhāṃ juhvati tasyā āhuteḥ somo rājā saṃbhavati'ityasyāḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:78: tathāhi-yā evāpo hutā dvitīyasyāmāhutau somabhāvaṃ gatāstābhireṣa pariṣvakto jīva iṣṭādikārī candrabhūyaṃ gataścandralokaṃ prāpta iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:79: nanu svatantrā āpaḥ śraddhādikrameṇa somabhāvamāpnuvantu tābhirapariṣvakta eva tu jīvaḥ sendriyamātro gatvā somabhāvamanubhavatu /
GSP33brsvbh3u:83: evaṃ hi śrutisāmānyaṃ kalpeta yadi yena rūpeṇa yena ca krameṇāpāṃ somabhāvastenaiva jīvasyāpi somabhāvo bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:86: ato dadhipayaḥprabhṛtayo dravabhūyastvādāpo hutāḥ sūkṣmībhūtā iṣṭādikāriṇamāśritā
GSP33brsvbh3u:87: nendhanena vidhinā dehe hūyamāne hutāḥ satya āhutimayya iṣṭādikāriṇaṃ pariveṣṭya
GSP33brsvbh3u:90: ayamarthaḥ-evaṃ hi sūkṣmadehapariṣvakto raṃhet yadyasya sthūlaṃ śarīraṃ raṃhato na bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:98: tasya ca dehendriyāderupādheḥ prādeśikatvānna tatra san dehāntaraṃ gantumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:99: tasmātsūkṣmadehapariṣvakto raṃhatikarmopasthāpitaḥ pratipattavyaḥ prāptavyo yo dehastadviṣayāyā bhāvanāyā utpādanāyā dīrghībhāvamātraṃ jalūkayopamīyate
GSP33brsvbh3u:103: ālayavijñānasaṃtāna ātmā tasya vṛttiḥ ṣaṭ pravṛttivijñānāni /
GSP33brsvbh3u:109: te hi śarīrātmavādino bhasmībhāvamātmana āhurna kasyacidgamanamiti //1//
GSP33brsvbh3u:118: yastu gandhasvedapākaprāṇāvakāśadānadarśanāddehasya pāñcabhautikatvaṃ paśyaṃstejobannātmakatvena tryātmakatve na parituṣyati,
GSP33brsvbh3u:121: ato na sa deho bhūtāntarāṇi pratyākhyāya kevalābhiradbhirārabdhuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:127: prāṇānāṃ jīvaddehe sāśrayatvamavagataṃ gacchati jīvaddehe tadanuvidhāyinaḥ prāṇā api gacchantīti dṛṣṭam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:129: sa caiṣāmanuvidheyaḥ sūkṣmo deho bhūtendriyamaya iti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:133: śrāvite 'pi spaṣṭe jīvasya prāṇaiḥ saha gamane 'gnyādigatiśaṅkā śrutivirodhotthāpanārthā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:138: prathame 'śravaṇāditi cenna tā eva hyupapatteḥ / BBs_3,1.5 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:139: pañcamyāmāhutāvapāṃ puruṣavacastvaprakāre pṛṣṭe prathamāyāmāhutau anapāṃ śraddhāyā hotavyatābhidhānasaṃbhaddhamanupapannaṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh3u:140: nahi yathā paśvādibhyo hṛdayādayo 'vayavā avadāya niṣkṛṣya hūyante,
GSP33brsvbh3u:141: evaṃ śraddhā buddhiprasādalakṣaṇā niṣkraṣṭuṃ vā hotuṃ vā śakyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:149: teṣāṃ yaḥ samāhāraḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ sā ṣaṭpraśnī,
GSP33brsvbh3u:154: kriyāsamabhihāreṇāpyāyanāpakṣayau yathā somasya tathā bhakṣayanti somamayāṃllokānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:159: bhoktṛṇāmeva satāṃ devopajīvitāmātreṇa bhākto gamayitavyo na tu carvaṇanigaraṇābhyāṃ mukhya iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:162: yathā hi balīvardādayo bhuñjānā api svaphalaṃ svāmino halādivahanenopakurvāṇā bhogyāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:163: evaṃ paramatattvamavidvāṃsa iṣṭādikāriṇa iha dadhipayaḥpuroḍāśādināmuṣmiṃśca loke paricārakatayā devānāmupabhogyā iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:166: yo hi pañcāgnividyāṃ na veda taṃ devā bhakṣayantīti nindyate pañcāgnividyāṃ stotuṃ tasyā eva prakṛtatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:177: ca yatkiñceha karma kṛtaṃ tasyāntaṃ prāpyeti śravaṇāt,
GSP33brsvbh3u:185: tathāca ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā ityācārameva yoninimittamupadiśati na tu karma /
GSP33brsvbh3u:186: stāṃ vā karmaśīle dve apyaviśeṣeṇānuśayastathāpi yadyapyayamiṣṭāpūrtakārī svayaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:188: smaryate hyanyasya sukṛtaduṣkṛtābhyāmanyasya tatsaṃbandhinastatphalabhāgitā-'patatyardhaśarīreṇa yasya bhāryā surāṃ pibet'ityādi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:190: tasmādyāvatsaṃpātamityupakramānurodhāt 'yat kiñceha karoti'iti ca śrutyantarānusārādramaṇīyacaraṇatvaṃ saṃbandhyantaragatamiṣṭāpūrtakāriṇi bhāktaṃ gamayitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:191: tathāca niranuśayānāmeva bhuktabhogānāmavaroha iti prāpta ucyate-yena karmakalāpena phalamupabhojitaṃ tasminnatīte 'pi sānuśayā eva candramaṇḍalādavarohanti
GSP33brsvbh3u:200: nahi 'yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juhuyāt'iti yāvajjīvamāhāravihārādisamaye 'pi homaṃ vidhatte nāpi madhyāhnādāvapi tu sāyaṃprātaḥkālāpekṣayā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:207: nahi yāvantaḥ saṃpātā yāvatāṃ vā puṃsāṃ saṃpātāste sarve tatreṣṭādikāriṇā bhogena kṣayaṃ nīyante /
GSP33brsvbh3u:212: api ceṣṭāpūrtakārīha janmani kevalaṃ na tanmātramakārṣīdapi tu godohanenāpaḥ praṇayan paśuphalamapyapūrvaṃ samacaiṣīt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:213: evamaharniśaṃ ca vāṅmanaḥ śarīraceṣṭābhiḥ puṇyāpuṇyamihāmutropabhogyaṃ saṃcitavato na martyalokādibhogyaṃ candraloke bhogyaṃ bhavitumarhati
GSP33brsvbh3u:214: naca svaphalavirodhino 'nuśayasya ṛte prāyaścittādātmajñānādvādattaphalasya dhvaṃsaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:217: anye tu sakalakarmakṣaye parāvṛttiśaṅkā nirbījeti manyamānā anyathādhikaraṇaṃ varṇayāñcakrurityāha-kecittāvadāhuriti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:219: tatredamiha vicāryate-kiṃ dattaphalānāmiṣṭāpūrtakarmaṇāmavaśeṣādihāvartante uta tānyupabhogena niravaśeṣaṃ kṣapayitvānupabhuktakarmaśādihāvartanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:220: tatreṣṭādīnāṃ bhogena samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣitatvānniranuśayā evānupabhuktakarmavaśādāvartanta iti prāpta ucyate-sānuśayā evāvartanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:222: yathā bhāṇḍasthe madhuni sarpiṣi vā kṣālite 'pi bhāṇḍalepakaṃ taccheṣaṃ madhu vā sarpirvā na kṣālayituṃ śakyamiti dṛṣṭamevaṃ tadanusārādetadapi pratipattavyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:224: yathā sevako hāstikāśvīyapadātivrātaparivṛto mahārājaṃ sevamānaḥ kālavaśācchatrapādukāvaśeṣo
GSP33brsvbh3u:225: na sevitumarhatīti dṛṣṭaṃ tanmūlā ca laukikī smṛtiriti dṛṣṭasmṛtibhyāṃ sānuśayā evāvartanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:234: iha janmani hi paryāyeṇa sukhaduḥkhe bhujyamāne dṛśyete /
GSP33brsvbh3u:239: na cābhivyaktaṃ ca karma phalaṃ na datta iti ca saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:243: phalopabhogena prakṣayānnāsti teṣāṃ karmāśya iti na te saṃsareyuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:250: anena niranuśayā evāvarohantīti pūrvapakṣabījaṃ nigūḍhamuddhāṭya nirasyati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:257: 'ācārahīnaṃ na punanti vedāḥ'iti hi smṛtyā vedapadena vedārthamupalakṣayantyā vedārthānuṣṭhānaśeṣatvamācārasyoktaṃ na tu svatantra ācāraḥ phalasya
GSP33brsvbh3u:269: 'ye vai ke cāsmāllokātprayanti candramasameva te sarve gacchanti'iti kauṣītakināṃ samāmnānāt,
GSP33brsvbh3u:271: tathāhi-dyusomavṛṣṭyannaretaḥpariṇāmakrameṇa tā evāpo yoṣidagnau hutāḥ puruṣavacaso bhavantītyaviśeṣeṇa śrutam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:276: 'jāyasva mriyasveti tṛtīyaṃ sthānam'iti ca sthānatvamātreṇāvagamātpathitvenāpratīteścandralokādavatīrṇānāmapi ca tatsthānatvasaṃbhavādasaṃpūraṇena
GSP33brsvbh3u:277: ananyamārgatayā ca tadbhogavirahiṇāmapi grāmaṃ gacchan vṛkṣamūlānyupasarpatītivatsaṃyamanādiṣu yamavaśyatāyai candralokagamanopapatteḥ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:280: na mārgatvaṃ tathāpi vettha yathāsau mārgo na saṃpūryate ityasya prativacanāvasare
GSP33brsvbh3u:282: yadi punastenaiva mārgeṇāgatya janmamaraṇaprabandhavat sthānamadhyāsīta naitattṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:283: nahīṣṭādikāriṇaścandramaṇḍalādavaruhya ramaṇīyāṃ ninditāṃ vā yoniṃ pratipadyamānāstṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ pratipadyante /
GSP33brsvbh3u:288: tato 'vagacchāmaḥ saṃyamanaṃ sapta ca yātanābhūmīryamavaśatayā pratipadyamānā aniṣṭādikāriṇo na candramaṇḍalādavarohantīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:289: tasmāt 'ye vai ke ca'itīṣṭādikāriviṣayaṃ na sarvaviṣayam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:298: saṃyamane tv anubhūyetareṣāmārohāv arohau tadgatidarśanāt / BBs_3,1.13 / // 13 //
GSP33brsvbh3u:317: yadyapi yathetamākāśamākāśādvāyumityato na tādātmyaṃ sphuṭamavagamyate tathāpi vāyurbhūtvetyādeḥ sphuṭataraṃ tādātmyāvagamādyathetamākāśamityetadapi tādātmya evāvatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:319: manuṣyaśarīrasya nandikeśvarasya devadeharūpapariṇāmasmaraṇāddevadehasya ca nahuṣasya tiryaktvasmaraṇāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:321: gauṇyāṃ ca vṛttau lakṣaṇāśabdaḥ prayukto guṇe lakṣaṇāyāḥ saṃbhavāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:324: samāno bhāvo rūpaṃ yeṣāṃ te sabhāvāsteṣāṃ bhāvaḥ sābhāvyaṃ sārūpyaṃ sādṛśyamiti yāvat /
GSP33brsvbh3u:329: yadi tu devājagaśarīre samasamaye syātāṃ na devaśarīramajagaraśarīraṃ śilpiśatenāpi kriyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:330: nahi dadhipayasī samasamaye parasparātmanī śakye saṃpādayituṃ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:334: nanvākāśabhāvena saṃyogamātraṃ lakṣyatāṃ kiṃ sādṛśyenetyata āha-vibhutvāccākāśeneti //22//
GSP33brsvbh3u:337: 'durniṣprapataram'iti duḥkhena niḥsaraṇaṃ brūte na tu vilambeneti manyate pūrvapakṣī /
GSP33brsvbh3u:338: vinā sthūlaśarīraṃ na sūkṣmaśarīre duḥkhabhāgīti durniṣprapataraṃ vilambaṃ lakṣayatīti rāddhāntaḥ //23//
GSP33brsvbh3u:341: ākāśasārūpyaṃ vāyudhūmādisaṃparko 'nuśayināmukta ihedānīṃ vrīhiyavā oṣādhivanaspatayastilabhāṣā iti jāyanta iti śrūyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:342: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimanuśayināṃ bhogādhiṣṭhānaṃ vrīhiyavādayaḥ sthāvarā bhavanti,
GSP33brsvbh3u:344: tatra manuṣyo jāyate devo jāyata ityādau prayoge janeḥ śarīraparigrahe prasiddhatvādatrāpi vrīhyādiśarīraparigraha eva janirmukhyārtha iti vrīhyādiśarīrā evānuśayina iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:345: naca ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā itivat karmaviśeṣāsaṃkīrtanāmāttadabhāve vrīhyādīnāṃ śarīrabhāvābhāvātkṣetrajñānantarādhiṣṭhitānāmeva yatsaṃparkamātramiti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:348: sāmānyaśāstrasya hiṃsāmānyadvāreṇa viśeṣopasarpaṇaṃ vilambeneti sākṣādviśeṣaspṛśaḥ śāstracchīghratarapravṛttāddurbalatvāditi sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:349: nahi balavadityeva durbalaṃ bādhate kintu sati virodhe /
GSP33brsvbh3u:352: 'agnīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabhet 'iti hi kratuprakaraṇe samāmnātaṃ kratvarthatāmasya gamayati na tvapanayati niṣedhāpāditāmasya puruṣaṃ pratyanarthahetutām
GSP33brsvbh3u:353: tenāstu niṣedhādasya puruṣaṃ pratyanarthahetutā vidheścha kratvarthatā ko virodhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:357: yadi ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā itivadvrīhyādiṣvanuśayavatāṃ karmaviśeṣaḥ kīrtyeta na caitadasti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:360: naca tadgatāyāḥ paśuhiṃsāyā 'na hiṃsyāt'iti niṣedhātkratvarthāyā api duḥkhaphalavatsaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:362: tathāhi-na hiṃsyāditi niṣedhasya niṣedhyādhīnanirūpaṇatayā yadarthaṃ niṣedhyaṃ tadartha eva niṣedho vijñāyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:363: na caitat 'nānṛtaṃ vadet' 'na tau paśau karoti'itivatkasyacitprakaraṇe samāmnātaṃ yenānṛtatavadanavadasya niṣedhasya kratvarthate niṣedho 'pi kratvarthaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:364: paśau niṣiddhayorājyabhāgayoḥ kratvarthatvena niṣedhasyāpi kratvarthatvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:369: kevalaṃ tasya rāgataḥ prāptatvāttadanuvādena nañarthaṃ vidhirupasaṃkrāmati,
GSP33brsvbh3u:370: tena puruṣārtho niṣedhya iti tadadhīnanirūpaṇo niṣedho 'pi puruṣārtho bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:371: tathā cāyamarthaḥ saṃpadyate-yatpuruṣārthaṃ hananaṃ tanna kuryāditi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:372: kratvarthasyāpi ca niṣedhe hiṃsāyāḥ kratūpakārakatvamapi kalpyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:373: naca dṛṣṭe puruṣokārakatve pratyarthini sati tatkalpanāspadam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:374: naca svātantryapāratantrye sati saṃyogapṛthaktve khādiratādivadekatra saṃbhavataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:380: vrīhyādibhāvamāpannāḥ khalvanuśayinaḥ puruṣairupabhuktā retaḥ sigbhāvamanubhavantī śrūyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:382: vrīhyādidehatve hi vrīhyādiṣu lūneṣvavahantinā phalīkṛteṣu ca vrīhyādidehavināśādanuśayinaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:383: pravaseyuriti kathamanuśayināṃ retaḥsigbhāvaḥ saṃsargamātre tu saṃsargiṣu vrīhyādiṣu
GSP33brsvbh3u:384: naṣṭeṣvapi na saṃsargiṇo 'nuśayinaḥ pravaseyuriti retaḥsigbhāva upapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:387: aśuddham iti cen na śabdāt / BBs_3,1.25 / // 25 //
GSP33brsvbh3u:390: sadyo jāto hi bālo na retaḥ sigbhavatyapi tu cirajātaḥ prauḍhayauvanaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:393: tatkimidānīṃ sarvatraivānuśayināṃ saṃsargamātraṃ tathāca ramaṇīyacaraṇā ityādiṣu tathābhāva āpadyeteti netyāha-
GSP33brsvbh3u:396: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33brsvbh3u:397: // iti tṛtīyādhyāyasya gatyāgaticintayā vairāgyanirūpaṇākhyaḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ // ____________________________________________________________________________________________
GSP33brsvbh3u:401: idānīṃ tu tasyaiva jīvasyāvasthābhedaḥ svayañjyotiṣṭvasiddhyartha prapañcayate-kiṃ prabodha iva svapne 'pi pāramārthikī sṛṣṭirāhosvinmāyāmayīti
GSP33brsvbh3u:402: yadyapi brahmaṇo 'nyasyānirvācyatayā jāgratsvapnāvasthāgatayorubhayorapi sargayormāyamayatvaṃ tathāpi yathā jāgratsṛṣṭirbrahmātmabhāvasākṣātkārātprāganuvartate
GSP33brsvbh3u:404: evaṃ kiṃ svapnasṛṣṭirāhosvit pratidinameva nivartata iti vimarśārthaḥ //
GSP33brsvbh3u:410: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-iha hi sarvāṇyeva mithyājñānānyudāharaṇaṃ teṣāṃ satyatvaṃ pratijñāyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:414: atathātvasya tvapratīyamānasya tathābhāvaprameyavirodhena kalpanāspadatvāt bādhakapratyayādatathātvamiti cet / na /
GSP33brsvbh3u:420: yathāhi kṣīraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kālāntare dadhi bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh3u:423: yadyasya tīvrātapaklāntisahitaṃ cakṣuḥ sa tasya rajatarūpatāṃ gṛhṇāti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:426: evamutpalamapi nīlalohitaṃ divā saurībhirbhābhirabhivyaktaṃ nīlatayā gṛhyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:428: evamasatyāṃ nidrāyāṃ sato 'pi rathādīnna gṛhṇāti nidrāṇastu gṛhṇātīti sāmagrībhedādvā kālabhedādvā virodhābhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:437: imamarthaṃ śrutirapi darśayati-'atha rathān rathayogān pathaḥ sṛjate'iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:438: naca 'na tatra rathā na rathayogā na panthāno bhavanti'iti virodhādupacaritārthāṃ sṛjata iti śrutirvyākhyeyā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:439: sṛjata iti hi śruterbahuśrutisaṃvādātpramāṇāntarasaṃvādācca balīyastvena tadanuguṇatayā na tatra rathā ityasyā bhāktatvena vyākhyānāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:440: jāgradavasthādarśanayogyā na santi na tu rathā na santīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:447: tadyathā svapne śuklāmbaradharaḥ śuklamālyānulepano brāhmaṇāyanaḥ priyavrataṃ pratyāha-priyavrata,
GSP33brsvbh3u:449: sa ca jāgrattathātmano mānamanubhūya svapnapratyayaṃ satyamabhimanyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:457: na tāvat kṣīrasyeva dadhi rajatasya pariṇāmaḥ śuktiḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:458: nahi jātvīśvaragṛhe cirasthitānyapi rajatabhājanāni śuktibhāvamanubhavanti dṛśyante /
GSP33brsvbh3u:459: na cetarasya rajatānubhavasamaye 'nyo 'nākulendriyo na tasya śuktibhāvamanubhavati pratyeti ca /
GSP33brsvbh3u:462: pāramārthike hyāsya toyabhāve tatsādhyāmudānyopaśamalakṣaṇārthakriyāṃ kuryānmarīcisādhyāmapi rūpaprakāśalakṣaṇām /
GSP33brsvbh3u:465: tadarthakriyākāritvavyāptaṃ toyatvaṃ mātrayāpi tāmakurvattoyameva na syāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:466: apica toyapratyayasamīcīnatvāyāsya dvaividhyamabhyupeyate taccābhyupagame 'pi na seddhumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:467: tathāhi-asamarthavidhāpāti toyametaditi manvāno na tṛṣṇayāpi marīcitoyamabhidhāvet yathā marīcīnanubhavan /
GSP33brsvbh3u:469: kimaparāddhaṃ marīciṣu toyaviparyāsena sarvajanīnena yattamatilaṅghya viparyāsāntaraṃ kalpyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:471: tatrāpi rajatajñānaṃ pūrvamutpannaṃ bādhyamuttaraṃ tu bādhakaṃ śuktijñānaṃ prāptipūrvakatvātpratiṣedhasya /
GSP33brsvbh3u:472: rajatajñānātprākprāpakābhāvena śukteraprāptāyāḥ pratiṣedhasaṃbhavātpūrvajñānaprāptaṃ tu rajataṃ śuktijñānamapabādhitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:476: naca vartamānarajatāvabhāsi jñānaṃ bhaviṣyattāmasyāgocarayanna bhaviṣyatā svasamayavartinīṃ śuktiṃ gocarayatā pratyayena bādhyate,
GSP33brsvbh3u:478: mā nāmāsya jñāsītpratyakṣaṃ bhaviṣyattāṃ tatpṛṣṭhabhāvi tvanumānamupakārabhāvahetumivāsati vināśapratyayopanipāte sthemānamākalayati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:480: tathāca rajatagocaraṃ pratyakṣaṃ vastutaḥ sthirameva rajataṃ gocarayet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:488: yadi cirasthāyitvaṃ yogyatā na sā pratyakṣagocaraḥ śakteratīndriyatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:493: tasmādatyantābhyāsavaśena pratyakṣānantaraṃ śīghratarotpannavinaśyadavasthānumānasahitapratyakṣābhiprāyameva cirasthāyīti gṛhyata iti mantavyam
GSP33brsvbh3u:499: yattu satyaṃ svapnadarśanamuktaṃ tatrāpyākhyātrā brāhmaṇāyanenākhyāte saṃvādābhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:504: rajanīsamaye 'pi hi bhāratādvarṣāntare ketumālādau vāsaro bhavatīti bhārate varṣa ityuktam //3//
GSP33brsvbh3u:506: sūcakaśca hi śruterācakṣate ca tadvidaḥ / BBs_3,2.4 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:512: prājñavyāpāratvena pāramārthikatvānumānaṃ pratyakṣeṇa bādhakapratyayena virudhyamānaṃ nātmānaṃ labhata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:515: parābhidhyānāt tu tirohitaṃ tato hyasya bandhaviparyayau / BBs_3,2.5 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:522: iha hi nāḍīpuritatparamātmāno jīvasya suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ sthānatvena śrūyante /
GSP33brsvbh3u:526: yadā nāḍyo vā purītadvā suṣuptasthānaṃ tadā viparītagrahaṇanivṛttāvapi na jīvasya paramātmabhāva iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:527: avidyānivṛttāvapi jīvasya paramātmabhāvāya kāraṇāntaramapekṣitavyaṃ tacca karmaiva na tu tattajñānaṃ viparītajñānanivṛttimātreṇa tasyopayogāt,
GSP33brsvbh3u:531: ata tu paramātmaiva nāḍīpurītasmṛtidvārā suṣuptisthānaṃ tato viparītajñānanivṛtterasti mātrayā paramātmabhāva upayogaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:532: tayā hi tāvadeṣa jīvastadavasthāno bhavati kevalam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:533: tattvajñānābhāvena samūlakāṣamavidyāyā akāṣājjāgratsvapnalakṣaṇaṃ jīvasya vyutthānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:536: nāḍīpurītatparamātmasu sthāneṣu suṣuptasya jīvasya nilayaṃ prati vikalpaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:537: yathā bahuṣu prāsādeṣveko narendraḥ kadācitkvacinnilīyate kadācitkvacidevameko jīvaḥ kadācinnāḍīṣu kadācitpurītati kadācidbrahmaṇīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:538: yathā nirapekṣā vrīhiyavāḥ kratusādhanībhūtapuroḍāśaprakṛtitayā śrutā ekārthā vikalpyante,
GSP33brsvbh3u:539: evaṃ saptamīśrutyā vāyatanaśrutyā vekanilayanārthāḥ parasparānapekṣā nāḍyadayo 'pi vikalpamarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:540: yatrāpi nāḍībhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītati śeta iti nāḍīpurītatoḥ samuccayaśravaṇam 'tathā tāsu tadā bhavati yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyati
GSP33brsvbh3u:541: athāsmin prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'iti nāḍībrahmaṇorādhārayoḥ samuccayaśravaṇam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:542: prāṇaśabdaṃ ca brahma 'athāsmin prāṇe brahmaṇi sa jīva ekadhā bhavati'nnirapekṣayoravedhāratvam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:545: evaṃ tābhireva saṃcaramāṇasya kadācidbrahmaivādhāra iti siddhamādhāratve nāḍīpurītatparamātmanāmanapekṣatvam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:547: prāpte 'bhidhīyate-jīvaḥ samuccayenaivaitāni nāḍyādīni svāpāyopaiti na vikalpena /
GSP33brsvbh3u:551: prakṛtakratusādhanībhūtapuroḍāśadravyaprakṛtitayā hi parasparānapekṣau vrīhiyavau vihitauśakrutaścaitau pratyekaṃ puroḍāśamabhinirvartayitum
GSP33brsvbh3u:552: tatra yadi miśrābhyāṃ puroḍāśo 'bhinirvartyeta parasparānapekṣavrīhiyavavidhātṛṇī ubhe api śāstre bādhyeyātām /
GSP33brsvbh3u:554: sa hi yathā vihitānyaṅgānyabhisamīkṣya pravartamāno naitānyanyathayitaṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:558: na cāṅgabhūtaindravāyavādigrahānurodhena yathā pradhānasya somayāgasyāvṛttirevamatrāpīti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:561: 'somamabhiplāvayati'iti ca vākyāntarānulocanayā rasadvāreṇa yāgasādhanībhūtasyendravāyvādyuddeśena prādeśamātreṣūrdhvapātreṣu grahaṇāni pṛthakprakalpanāni saṃskārā vidhīyante,
GSP33brsvbh3u:566: naca yāvanmātramekamūrdhvapātraṃ vyāpnoti tāvanmātraṃ gṛhītvā pariśiṣṭaṃ tyajyeteti yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:568: evaṃ taddṛṣṭārthaṃ bhavedyadi tatsarvaṃ yāga upayujyeta /
GSP33brsvbh3u:570: tasmātsakalasya somarasasya yāgaśeṣatvena saṃskārārhatvādekaikena ca grahaṇena sakalasya
GSP33brsvbh3u:573: ata eva samuccayadarśanaṃ 'daśautānadhvaryuḥ prātaḥ savane grahan gṛhṇāti'iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:577: teṣāṃ ca samuccaye sati yāvadyaduddeśena gṛhītaṃ tāvattasyai devatāyai tyaktavyamityarthādyāgasyāvṛttyā bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:578: yadi punaḥ pṛthakkṛtānyapyekīkṛtya kāñcana devatāmuddiśya tyajeran,
GSP33brsvbh3u:588: sā coktā bhāṣyakṛtā-yatrāpi nirapekṣā iva nāḍīḥ suptisthānatvena śrāvayatītyādinā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:591: nanu yadi brahmaiva nilayanasthānaṃ tāvanmātramucyatāṃ kṛtaṃ nāḍyupanyāsenetyata āha-apicātreti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:596: pittenābhivyāptakaraṇo na bāhyānviṣayānvedeti taddvārā sukhaduḥkhābhāvena tatkāraṇapāpmāsparśena nāḍīstutiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:597: yadā tu tejo brahma tadā sugamam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:598: apica nāḍyaḥ purītadvā jīvasyopādhyādhāra eva bhavatīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:601: tathāhi-nāḍyaḥ purītadvā jīvasyopādhīnāṃ karaṇānāmāśrayo jīvastu brāhmāvyatirekātsvamahipratiṣṭhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:603: vikalpa tu vyatirekaṃ brahmaṇa ādhāratvamucyate jīvaṃ prati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:604: tathāca suṣuptāvasthāyāmupādhīnāmasamudācārājjīvasya brahmātmatvameva brahmādhāratvaṃ na tu nāḍīpurītādhāratvam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:605: tadupādhikaraṇamātrādhāratayā tu suṣuptadaśārambhāya jīvasya nāḍīpurītadādhāratvamityatulyārthatayā na vikalpa iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:607: autsagikaṃ brahmasvarūpatvaṃ jīvasyāsati jāgratsvapnadaśārūpe 'pavāde suṣuptavasthāyāṃ nānyathayituṃ śakyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:608: apica ye 'pi sthānavikalpamāsthiṣacata tairapi viśeṣavijñānopaśamalakṣaṇā suṣuptyavasthāṅgīkartavyā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:609: na ceyamātmatādātmyaṃ vinā nāḍyādiṣu paramātmavyatirikteṣu sthāneṣūpapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:610: tatra hi sthito 'yaṃ jīva ātmavyatirekābhimānī sannavaśyaṃ viśeṣajñānavān bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:620: aupādhike tu paricchede yatropādhisaṃnihitastanmātraṃ na jānīyānna tu sarvam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:622: tasmātsarvaviśeṣavijñānapratyastamayīṃ suṣuptiṃ prasādayata tadāsya sarvopādhyupasaṃhāro vaktavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:624: guṇapradhānabhāvena samuccayo na samapradhānatayāgneyādivaditi vadanvikalpamapyapākaroti-naca vayamiheti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:626: naca suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ jīvasya svarūpeṇa nāḍyādisthānatvapratipādane kiñcitprayojanaṃ brahmabhūyapratipādane tvasti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:627: tasmānna samapradhānabhāvena samuccayo nāpi vikalpa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:635: sa vānyo veti īśvaro veti saṃbhavamātreṇopanyāsaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:639: yaddhi dvyahādinirvartanīyamekasya puṃsaścoditaṃ karma tasya pūrvedyuranuṣṭhitasyāsti smṛtiriti vaktavye 'nuḥ pratyabhijñānasūcanārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:643: jīvaḥ pratinyāyaṃ saṃprasāde suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ vṛddhāntāyādravati āgacchati pratiyoni /
GSP33brsvbh3u:644: yohi vyāghrayoniḥ suṣupto buddhāntamāgacchan sa vyāghra eva bhavati na jātyantaram /
GSP33brsvbh3u:645: tadidamuktam-ta iha vyāghro vā siṃho veti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:647: yo hi jīvaḥ suptaḥ sa śarīrāntara uttiṣṭhati śarīrāntaragatastu suptajīvasaṃbandhini śarīra uttiṣṭhati,
GSP33brsvbh3u:649: apica na jīvo nāma kaścitparasmādanya iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:653: evamanādyanirvacanīyāvidyopadhānabhedopādhikalpito jīvo na vastutaḥ paramātmano bhidyate tadupādyudbhavābhibhavābhyāṃ codbhūta ityabhibhūta iva pratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:656: tasya cāvidyātadvāsanopādheranāditayā kāryakāraṇabhāvena pravahataḥ suvivecatayā tadupahito jīvaḥ suviveca iti //9//
GSP33brsvbh3u:662: tadyathā kaścitsuptotthitaḥ prāha sukhamahamasvāpsaṃ laghūni me gātrāṇi prasannaṃ me mana iti,
GSP33brsvbh3u:663: kaścitpunarduḥkhamasvāpsaṃ gurūṇi me gātrāṇi bhramatyanavasthitaṃ me mana iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:668: yadyapi viśeṣavijñānopaśamena mohasuṣuptayoḥ sāmyaṃ tathāpi naikyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:670: bāhyendriyavyāpārabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ tu bhede tayoḥ suṣuptamohayorapi prayojanabhedātkāraṇabhedāllakṣaṇabhedācca bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:673: yadyapi satyapi mohe na maraṇaṃ tathāpyasati mohe na maraṇamiti maraṇārtho mohaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:676: tasmāt suṣuptamohāvasthayorbrahmaṇā saṃpattāvapi suṣupte yādṛśī saṃpattirna tādṛśī moha ityardhasaṃpattiruktā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:681: na sthānato 'pi parasyobhayaliṅgaṃ sarvatra hi / BBs_3,2.11 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:684: tathāpi prapañcaliṅgānāṃ bahvīnāṃ śrutīnāṃ darśanādbhavati punarvicikitsā atastannivāraṇāyārambhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:691: tasmādubhayaliṅgakaśāstraprāmāṇyādubhayarūpatā brahmaṇaḥ pāramārthikīti prāpta ucyate-na sthānata upādhito 'pi parasya brahmaṇa ubhayacihnatvasaṃbhavaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:693: pāramārthikatve hyupādhijanitasya rūpasya brahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmo bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:708: na bhedād iti cen na pratyekam atadvacanāt / BBs_3,2.12 / // 12 //
GSP33brsvbh3u:728: kiṃ sāllakṣaṇaṃ ca prakāśalakṣaṇaṃ ca brahma kiṃ sallakṣaṇameva brahmota prakāśalakṣaṇameveti tatra pūrvapakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti-prakāśavaccāvaiyarthyāt
GSP33brsvbh3u:734: yathā sarvagandhatvādayo 'pi tu prakāśarūpameva saditi nobhayarūpatvaṃ brahmaṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:737: bhede na sthānato 'pīti nirākṛtamiti nādhikaraṇāntaraṃ prayojayati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:739: sarveṣāṃ ca sādhāraṇe pravilayārthatve sati ' arūpavadeva hi tatpradhānatvāt' iti vinigamanakāraṇavacanamanavakāśaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:740: evaṃ hi tasyāvakāśaḥ syādyāda kāścidupāsanāparatayā rūpamācakṣīran kāścinnīrūpabrahmapratipādanaparā bhaveyuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:746: vāstavasya vā prapañcasya pravilayaḥ sarpiṣa ivāgnisaṃyogāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:748: na tāvadvāstavaḥ sarvasādhāraṇaḥ pṛthivyādiprapañcaḥ puruṣamātreṇa śakyaḥ samucchettum /
GSP33brsvbh3u:749: apica prahlādaśukādibhiḥ puruṣadhaureyaiḥ samūlamunmūlitaḥ prapañca iti śūnyaṃ jagadbhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:752: samāropitarūpastu prapañco brahmatattvajñāpanaparaireva vākyairbrahmatattvamavabodhayadbhiḥ śakyaḥ samucchettumiti kṛtamatra vidhinā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:753: nahi vidhiśatenāpi vinā tattvāvabodhanaṃ pravartasvātmajñāna iti vā kuru prapañcapravilayaṃ veti pravartitaḥ śaknoti prapañcapravilayaṃ kartum
GSP33brsvbh3u:754: na cāsyātmajñānavidhiṃ vinā vedāntārthabrahmatattvāvabodho na bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:755: maulikasya svādhyāyādhyayanavidhereva vivakṣitārthatayā sakalasya vedarāśeḥ phalavadarthāvabodhanaparatāmāpādayato vidyamānatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:759: tasmāt 'jartilayavāgvā juhuyāt'itivadvidhisarūpā ete 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavya'ityādayo na tu vidhaya iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:760: tadidamuktam-draṣṭavyādiśabdā api tattvābhimudhīkaraṇapradhānā na tattvāvabodhavidhipradhānā iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:761: apica brahmatattvaṃ niṣprapañcamuktaṃ na tatra niyojyaḥ kaścitsaṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:778: kiñcānyanniyoganiṣṭhatayaiva ca paryavasyatyāmnāye yadabhyupagataṃbhavadbhiḥ śāstraparyālocanayāniyojyabrahmātmatvaṃ jīvasyeti tadetacchāstrāvirodhādapramāṇakam
GSP33brsvbh3u:779: athaitacchāstramaniyojyabrahmātmatvaṃ ca jīvasya pratipādayati jīvaṃ ca niyuktaṃ tato dvyarthaṃ ca viruddhārthaṃ ca syādityāha-atheti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:781: nahi tadvākyaṃ tasya niyojyatāmāhāpi tu laukikapramāṇasiddhāṃ niyojyatāmāśritya darśapūrṇamāsau vidhatte /
GSP33brsvbh3u:782: idaṃ tu niyojyatāmapanayati ca niyuṅkte ceti durghaṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:784: paurvāparyālocanayā vedāntānāṃ tattvaniṣṭhatā śrutā na śrutā niyoganiṣṭhatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:786: niyoganiṣṭhatve vākyasya darśapaurṇāmāsakarmaṇa ivāpūrvāvāntaravyāpārādātmajñānakarmaṇo 'pyapūrvāvāntaravyāpārādeva svargādiphalavanmokṣasyānandarūpaphalasya siddhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:793: prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato bravīti ca bhūyaḥ / BBs_3,2.22 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:795: dve eva brahmaṇo rūpe brahmaṇaḥ paramārthato 'rūpasyādhyāropite dve eva rūpe tābhyāṃ hi tadrūpyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:798: atra pṛthivyaptejāṃsi trīṇi bhūtāni brahmaṇo rūpaṃ mūrtaṃ mūrcchitāvayavamitaretarānupraviṣṭāvayavaṃ kaṭhinamiti yāvat /
GSP33brsvbh3u:804: tasyaitasya brahmarūpasya tejo 'bannasya caturviśeṣaṇasyaiṣa rasaḥ sāro ya eṣa savitā tapati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:809: tasyaitasyāmūrtasyaitasyāmṛtasyaitasya yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso ya eṣa etasmin savitṛmaṇḍale puruṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:810: karaṇātmako hiraṇyagarbhaprāṇāhvayastyasya hyeṣa rasaḥ sāro nityaparokṣatā ca sāmyamityadhidaivatam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:812: mūrtasyaitasya martyasyaitasya sthitasyaitasya sata eṣa raso yaccakṣuḥ sato hyoṣa rasa iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:814: yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso yo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇekṣan puruṣastyasya hyeṣa rasaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:815: liṅgasya hi karaṇātmakasya hiraṇyagarbhasya dakṣiṇamakṣyadhiṣṭhānaṃ śruteradhigatam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:816: tadevaṃ brahmaṇa aupādhikayormūrtāmūrtayorādhyātmikādhidaivikayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvena vibhāgo vyākhyātaḥ sattyacchabdavācyayoḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:817: athedānīṃ tasya karaṇātmanaḥ puruṣasya liṅgasya rūpaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:821: niravaśeṣaṃ savāsanaṃ satyarūpamuktvā yattatsatyasya satyamuktaṃ brahma tatsvarūpāvadhāraṇārthamidamārabhyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:822: yataḥ satyasya rūpaṃ niḥśeṣamuktamato 'vaśiṣṭaṃ satyasya yatsatyaṃ tasyānantaraṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:823: taduktihetukaṃ svarūpaṃ vaktavyamityāha-athāta ādeśaḥkathanaṃ satyasatyasya paramātmanastamāha-neti netīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:828: atraivamarthenetinā yatsaṃnihitaṃ parāmṛṣṭaṃ tanniṣidhyate nañā saṃnihitaṃ ca mūrtāmūrtaṃ savāsanaṃ rūpadvayam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:830: tatredaṃ vicāryate-kiṃ rūpadvayaṃ savāsanaṃ brahma ca sarvameva ca pratiṣidhyate,
GSP33brsvbh3u:831: uta brahmaivātha savāsanaṃ rūpadvayaṃ brahma tu pariśiṣyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:832: yadyapi teṣu teṣu vedāntapradeśeṣu brahmasvarūpaṃ pratipāditaṃ tadasadbhāvajñānaṃ ca ninditam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:833: 'astītyevopalabdhavyaḥ'iti cāsya sattvamavadhāritaṃ tathāpi sadbodharūpaṃ tadbrahma savāsanamūrtāmūrtarūpasādhāraṇatayā ca sāmānyaṃ tasya caite viśeṣā mūrtāmūrtādayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:838: ata eva nahyetasmāditi netyanyatparamastīti niṣedhāt paraṃ nāstīti sarvaniṣedhameva tattvamāha śrutiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:848: katarasyāstu niṣedha iti viśaye prapañcapratiṣedhe samastapratyakṣādivyākopaprasaṅgāt,
GSP33brsvbh3u:849: brahmapratiṣedhe tvavyākopādbrahmaiva pratiṣedhena saṃbadhyate yogyatvānna prapañcastadvaiparītyāt,
GSP33brsvbh3u:851: tatra prathamaṃ pakṣaṃ nirākaroti-na tāvadubhayapratiṣedha upapadyate śūnyavādaprasaṅgāditi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:852: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-upādhayo hyamī pṛthivyādayo 'vidyākalpitā na tu śoṇakarkādaya iva viśeṣā aśvatvasya /
GSP33brsvbh3u:860: tadidamuktam-apariśiṣyamāṇe cānyasminya itaraḥ pratiṣeddhumārabhyate tasya pratiṣedbhumaśakyatvāttasyaiva paramārthatvāpatteḥ pratiṣedhānupapattiḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:866: tathāca yastasya śabdaḥ prāpakaḥ sa tatpara iti sa brahmaṇi pramāṇamiti kathamasya niṣedho 'pi pramāṇavān /
GSP33brsvbh3u:867: naca paryudāsādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣanyāyena vikalpaḥ vastuni siddhasvabhāve tadanupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:874: upakramaparāmarśopasaṃhāraparyālocanayā hi vedāntānāṃ sarveṣāmeva brahmaparatvamupapāditaṃ prathame 'dhyāye /
GSP33brsvbh3u:875: na cāsatyāmākāṅkṣāyāṃ dūratarasthena pratiṣedhenaiṣāṃ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:876: yacca vāṅmanasātītatayā brahmaṇastatpratiṣedhasya na pramāṇāntaravirodha iti tatrāha-vāṅmanasātītatvamapīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:881: tasmādvedāntavācā manasi saṃnidhānādbrahmaṇo vāṅmanasātītatvaṃ nāñjasamapi tu pratipādanaprakriyopakrama eṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:882: yathā gavādayo viṣayāḥ sākṣācchṛṅgagrāhikayā pratipādyante pratiyante ca naivaṃ brahma /
GSP33brsvbh3u:884: nanu prakṛtapratiṣedhe brahmaṇo 'pi kasmānna pratiṣedha ityata āha-taddhi prakṛtaṃ prapañcitaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:885: pradhānaṃ prakṛtaṃ prapañcaśca pradhānaṃ na brahma tasya ṣaṣṭhyantatayā prapañcāvacchedakatvenāpradhānatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:886: tato 'nyadbravītīti neti netīti pratiṣedhādanyadbhūyo bravītīti tannirvacanam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:887: nahyetasmādityasya yadā nahyetasmāditi neti netyādiṣṭādbrahmaṇo 'nyatparamastīti vyākhyānaṃ tadā prapañcapratiṣedhādanyadbrahmaiva bravītīti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:888: yadā tu nahyetasmāditi sarvanāmnā pratiṣedho brahmaṇa ādeśaḥ parāmṛśyate tadāpi prapañcapratiṣedhamātraṃ na pratipattavyamapi tu tena pratiṣedhena bhāvarūpaṃ brahmopalakṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:889: kasmādityata āha-tato bravīti ca bhūya iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:891: atha brahmaṇo nāmadheyaṃ nāma satyasya satyamiti tadvyācaṣṭe śrutiḥ-'prāṇā vai satyam'iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:893: tat khalu satyamitarāpekṣayā tasyāpi paraṃ satyaṃ brahma /
GSP33brsvbh3u:894: tadevaṃ yataḥ pratiṣedhasya parastādbravīti tasmānna prapañcapratiṣedhamātraṃ brahmāpi tu bhāvarūpamiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:895: tadevaṃ pūrvasmin vyākhyāne nirvacanaṃ bravītīti vyākhyātam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:907: kuṇḍalādirūpeṇa tu bheda ityuktaṃ tena viṣayabhedādbhedābhedayoravirodha ityekaviṣayatvena vā sarvadopalabdheravirodhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:908: viruddhamiti hi naḥ kva saṃpratyayo na yatpramāṇenopalabhyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:909: āgamataśca pramāṇādekagocarāvapi bhedābhedau pratīyamānau na virodhamāvahataḥ savitṛprakāśayoriva pratyakṣātpramāṇādbhedābhedāviti //27//
GSP33brsvbh3u:921: ahitvakuṇḍalatve bhinne iti vaktavyaṃ na tu vastunastābhyāṃ bhedābhedau /
GSP33brsvbh3u:924: atha vastuno na bhidyete ahitvakuṇḍalatve tathā sati ko bhedābhedayorviṣayabhedastayorvastuno 'nanyatvenābhedāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:925: na caikaviṣayatve 'pi sadānubhūyamānatvādbhedābhedayoravirodhaḥ svarūpaviruddhayorapyavirodhe kva nāma virodho vyavatiṣṭheta /
GSP33brsvbh3u:928: prapañcitaṃ caitadasmābhiḥ prathamasūtra iti neha prapañcitam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:933: yathāha śrutiḥ-'tameva viditvātimṛtyumeti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya'iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:944: tadyathā prācī pratīcī dakṣiṇodīcīti catasraḥ kalā avayavā iva kalāḥ sa prakāśavānnāma prathamaḥ pādaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:945: etadupāsanāyāṃ prakāśavān mukhyo bhavatīti prakāśavān pādaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:946: athāparāḥ pṛthivyantarikṣaṃ dyauḥ samudra iti catasraḥ kalā eṣa dvitīyaḥ pādo 'nantavānnāma /
GSP33brsvbh3u:948: athāgniḥ sūryaścandramā vidyuditi catasraḥ kalāḥ sa jyotiṣmānnāma pādastṛtīyastadupāsanājjyotiṣmān bhavatīti jyotiṣmān pādaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:949: atha ghrāṇaścakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vāgiti catasraḥ kalāścaturthaḥ pāda āyatanavānnāma /
GSP33brsvbh3u:950: ete ghrāṇādayo hi gandhādiviṣayā mana āyatanamāśritya bhogasādhanaṃ bhavantītyāyatanavānnāma pādaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:962: yathā hi tantavaḥ paṭaṃ vidhārayanti tadupādānatvādevaṃ brahmāpi jagadvidhārayati tadupapādakatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:970: manaso brahmapratīkasya samāropitabrahmabhāvasya vāgghrāṇaścakṣuḥ śrotramiti catvāraḥ pādāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:971: mano hi vaktavyaghrātavyadraṣṭavyaśrotavyān gocarān vāgādibhiḥ saṃcaratīti saṃcaraṇasādhāraṇatayā manasaḥ pādastadidamadhyātman /
GSP33brsvbh3u:972: ākāśasya brahmapratīkasyāgnirvāyurādityo diśa iti catvāraḥ pādāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:973: te hi vyāpino nabhasa udara iva goḥ pādā vilagnā upalakṣyanta iti pādāstadidamadhidaivatam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:974: tadanena pādavaditi vaidikaṃ nidarśanaṃ vyākhyāya laukikaṃ cedaṃ nidarśanamityāha-athavā pādavaditi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:982: bhāsante tadvigame tu gabhastimaṇḍalenaikībhavantyatastena saṃbadhyanta evamihāpīti //34//
GSP33brsvbh3u:985: ekībhāvaḥ kasmādiha saṃbandhaḥ kathañcidvyākhyāyate na mukhya evetyetatsūtreṇa pariharati-
GSP33brsvbh3u:988: svabhāvaścedanena saṃbandhatvena spṛṣṭastataḥ svābhāvikastādātmyānnātiricyata iti tarkapāda upapāditamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:989: tathā bhedo 'pi trividho vānyādṛśaḥ svābhāvika ityarthaḥ //35//
GSP33brsvbh3u:995: brahmādvaitasiddhāvapi na sarvagatatvaṃ sarvavyāpitā sarvasya brahmaṇā svarūpeṇa
GSP33brsvbh3u:997: ca svasādhanopanyāsena ca sarvagatatvamapyātmanaḥ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:998: advaite siddhe sarvo 'yamanirvacanīyaḥ prapañcāvabhāso brahmādhiṣṭhāna iti sarvasya brahmasaṃbandhādbrahma sarvagatamiti siddham //37//
GSP33brsvbh3u:1003: nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvasya brahmaṇaḥ kuta īśvaratvaṃ kutaśca phalahetutvamapītyata āha-tasyaiva brahmaṇo vyāvahārikyāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1012: atha karmaṇa eva phalaṃ kasmānna bhavatītyata āha-karmaṇastvanukṣaṇavināśinaḥpratyakṣavināśina iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1017: nahi svarga ātmānaṃ labhatāmityadhikāriṇaḥ kāmayante kintu bhogyo 'smākaṃbhavatviti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1018: tena yādṛśamebhiḥ kāmyate tādṛśasya phalatvamiti bhogyameva satphalamiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1021: apica svarganarakau tīvratame sukhaduḥkhe iti tadviṣayeṇānubhavena bhogāparanāmnāvaśyaṃ bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1022: tasmādanubhavayogye ananubhūyamāne śaśaśṛṅgavanna sta iti niścīyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1023: codayati-athocyeta mā bhūtkarmānantaraṃ phalotpādaḥ karmākāryādapūrvātphalamutpatsyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1025: yadyadacetanaṃ tattatsarvaṃ cetanādhiṣṭhitaṃ pravartata iti pratyakṣāgamābhyāmavadhāritam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1035: nanu 'svargakāmo yajeta'ityādayaḥ śrutayaḥ phalaṃ prati na sādhanatayā yāgaṃ vidadhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1036: tathāhi-yadi yāgādaya eva kriyā na tadatiriktā bhāvanā tathāpi ta eva svapadebhyaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1037: pūrvāparībhūtāḥ sādhyasvabhāvā avagamyanta iti na sādhyāntaramapekṣanta iti na svargeṇa
GSP33brsvbh3u:1039: athāpi tadatirekiṇī bhāvānāsti tathāpyasau bhāvyāpekṣāpi svapadopāttaṃ pūrvāvagataṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1040: na bhāvyaṃ dhātvarthamapahāya na bhinnapadopāttaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṇaṃ ca svargādi bhāvyatayā svīkartumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1043: na kevalaṃ śabdato vastutaśca puruṣaprayatnasya bhāvanāyāḥ sākṣāddhātvartha eva sādhyo na tu svargādistasya tadavyāpyatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1044: svargādestu nāmapadābhidheyatayā siddharūpasyākhyātavācyaṃ sādhyaṃ dhātvarthaṃ prati 'bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyate'iti nyāyātsādhanatayā guṇatvenābhisaṃbandhaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1047: samīhitasya ca svargāderasādhyatvānna yāgādayaḥ puruṣasyopakurvantyanupakāriṇāṃ caiṣāṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1048: na puruṣa īṣṭe anīśānaśca na teṣu saṃbhavatyadhikārītyadhikārābhāvapratipāditānarthakyaparihārāya
GSP33brsvbh3u:1053: tatrādhikārasyoktena krameṇa nirākaraṇādasato 'pi pratīyamānasya vicārāsahasyopāyatāmātreṇāvasthānādanena vākyena dehātmabhāvapravilayastatpareṇa kriyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1055: niṣedhavākyāni ca sākṣādeva pravṛttiniṣedhena vidhivākyāni cānyāni 'sāṃgrahaṇyā yajeta
GSP33brsvbh3u:1057: yathā viṣaṃ bhuṅkṣava māsya gṛhe bhuṅkṣveti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1060: tanniṣedhena tu brahmaṇi praṇidhānamādadhacchāstraṃ śāstraṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1063: kathaṃ tarhi vidhiḥ kimatra kathaṃ pravartanāmātratvādvidhestasya cādhikāramantareṇāpyupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1064: nahi yo yaḥ pravartayati sa sarvo 'dhikṛtamapekṣate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1065: pavanādeḥ pravartakasya tadanapekṣatvāditiśaṅkāmapācikīrṣurāha-tatra ca vidhiśruterviṣayabhāvopagamādyāgaḥ svargasyotpādaka iti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1075: tathāca 'svargakāmo yajeta'ityādiṣu svargakāmādeḥ samīhitopāyā gamyante yāgādayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1080: na caite sākṣādbhāvanābhāvyā api kartrapekṣitasādhanatāvidhyupahitamaryādā bhāvanoddeśyā bhavitumarhanti,
GSP33brsvbh3u:1090: phalasya sākṣādbhāvanāvyāpyatvavirahiṇo 'pi taduddeśyatayā sarvatra vyāpitayā vyavasthānātsvargasādhane yāgādau svargakāmāderadhikāra iti siddham
GSP33brsvbh3u:1091: na cāprāptārthaviṣayāḥ sāṃgrahaṇyādiyāgavidhayaḥ parisaṃkhyāyakā niyāmakā vā bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1095: svarasataḥ pratīyamāner'the vākyasya tādarthye saṃbhavati na saṃpātāyātaparatvamucitam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1103: etaduktaṃ bhavati-karmaṇo hi phalaṃ prati yatsādhanatvaṃ śrutaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:1105: naca vyāpāravati satyeva vyāpāro nāsatīti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1107: asatyapi ca tailapānakarmaṇi tena puṣṭau kartavyāyāmantarā tailapariṇāmabhedānāṃ tadavāntaravyāpāratvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1108: tasmātkarmakāryamapūrvaṃ karmaṇā phale kartavye tadavāntaravyāpāra iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1109: yadā punaḥ phalopajananānyathānupapattyā kiñcitkalpyate tadāphalasya vā pūrvāvasthā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1116: nahi jātu mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍādayaḥ kumbhakārādyanadhiṣṭhitāḥ kumbhādyārambhāya vibhavavanto dṛṣṭāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1119: tasmādacetanaṃ karma vāpūrvaṃ vā na cetanānadhiṣṭhitaṃ svatantraṃ svakāryaṃ pravartitumutsahate naca caitanyamātraṃ karmasvarūpasāmānyaviniyogādiviśeṣavijñānaśūnyamupayujyate,
GSP33brsvbh3u:1122: cetanādhiṣṭhānādacetanānāṃ kāryārambhakatvamiti tathā caitanyaṃ devatāyā asati bādhake
GSP33brsvbh3u:1123: śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇaprasiddhaṃ na śakyaṃ pratiṣedhdhumityapi spaṣṭaṃ niraṭaṅki devatādhikaraṇe /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1125: bhirārādhitaḥ prasannaḥ svānurūpamārādhakāya phalaṃ prayacchati virodhataścāpakriyābhirvirodhakāyāhitāmityapi suprasiddham /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1126: tadiha kevalaṃ karma vāpūrvaṃ vā cetanānadhiṣṭhitamacetanaṃ phalaṃ prasūta iti dṛṣṭaviruddham /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1128: karma na phalaṃ prasūta iti kalpyate dṛṣṭavirodhādevamihāpīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1129: tathā devapūjātmako yāgo devatāṃ naprasādayan phalaṃ prasūta ityapi dṛṣṭaviruddham /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1135: naca śubhāśubhakāriṇāṃ tadanurūpaṃ phalaṃ prasuvānā devatā dveṣapakṣapātavatīti yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1136: nahi rājā sādhukāriṇamanugṛhṇannigṛhṇan vā pāpakāriṇaṃ bhavati dviṣṭo rakto vā tadvadalaukiko 'pīśvaraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1137: yathā ca paramāpūrve kartavye utpattyapūrvāṇāmaṅgāpūrvāṇāṃ copayogaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1140: tasmāddṛṣṭāvirodhena devatārādhanāt phalaṃ na tvapūrvātkarmaṇo vā kevalādvirodhato hetuvyapadeśaśca śrautaḥ smārtaśca vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1141: ye punarantaryāmivyāpārāyā phalotpādanāyā nityatvaṃ sarvasādhāraṇatvamiti manyamānā
GSP33brsvbh3u:1144: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite bhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2//
GSP33brsvbh3u:1153: sāvayavasya hyavayavānāṃ bhedāttadavayavaviśiṣṭabrahmagocarāṇi vijñānāni gocarabhedādbhidyerannityavayavā brahmaṇo nirākṛtāḥ pūrvāparādītyanena
GSP33brsvbh3u:1154: naca nānāsvabhāvaṃ brahma yataḥ svabhāvabhedādbhinnāni jñānānītyuktam-
GSP33brsvbh3u:1158: yathā somaśarmaiko 'pyācāryo māyulapitā putro bhrātā bhartā jāmātā dvijottama ityanekarūpa ityata uktam-
GSP33brsvbh3u:1160: ekasmin gocare saṃbhavanti bahūni vijñānāni na tvanekākāraṇītyuktam-
GSP33brsvbh3u:1165: tattadguṇopādhānabrahmaviṣayā upāsanāḥ prāṇādiviṣayāśca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭakramuktiphalā viṣayabhedādbhidyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1175: jyotiṣṭomasya prakrāntatvādyajeteti tadanuvādājjyotiriti prātipadikamātraṃ paṭhitvā etenetyanukṛṣya karmasāmānādhikaraṇyena
GSP33brsvbh3u:1178: jyotiḥśabdasya 'vasante vasante jyotiṣā'iti ca jyotiṣṭome yogadarśanāt nāmaikadeśena ca nāmopalakṣaṇasya lokasiddhatvādbhīmasenopalakṣaṇabhīmapadavat,
GSP33brsvbh3u:1182: prakṛtasyaiva jyotiṣṭomasya sahasradakṣiṇālakṣaṇaguṇavidhānārthamayamanuvādo na tu karmāntaramiti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1183: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-bhavetpūrvasmin guṇavidhiryadi tadeva prakaraṇaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1187: na jātu dehi devadattāya gāmatha devāya vājinamiti devaśabdāddevadattaṃ vājibhājamavasyanti laukikāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1188: tathā copariṣṭāt 'yajeta'iti śrūyamāṇamasaṃbaddhārthapadavyavāyāttatkarmabuddhimanādadhat tatra guṇavidhānamātrāsamarthaṃ karmāntarameva vidhatte
GSP33brsvbh3u:1189: na caikatrānupapattyā lakṣaṇayā jyotiḥśabdo jyotiṣṭome pravṛtta ityasatyāmanupapattau lākṣaṇiko yuktaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1190: nahi gāṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra gāṅgāpadaṃ lākṣaṇikamiti mīno gāṅgāyāmityatrāpi lākṣaṇikaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1191: bhede 'pi ca prathamaṃ saṃjñāntareṇollikhite yajiśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ karmanāmadheyatāmātratāmāvahati natu saṃjñāntaropajanitāṃ bhedadhiyamapanetumutsahate
GSP33brsvbh3u:1194: bhavatu saṃjñāntarātkarmabhedaḥ prastute tu kimāyātamityata āha-
GSP33brsvbh3u:1196: yathaiva kāṭhakādisamākhyā granthe prayujyanta evaṃ jñāne 'pi laukikāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1197: na cāsti viśeṣo yato granthe mukhyāvijñāne gauṇī bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1200: tathāca yadā jyotiṣṭomasaṃnidhau śrūyamāṇaṃ samākhyāntaraṃ tatpratīkamapi karmaṇo
GSP33brsvbh3u:1201: bhedakaṃ tadā kaiva kathā śākhāntarīye viprakṛṣṭatame 'tatpratīkabhūtasamākhyāntarābhidheye jñāta iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1202: tathā rūpabhedo 'pi karmabhedasya pratipādakaḥ prasiddho yathā 'vaiśvadevyāmikṣā vājibhyo vājinam'ityevamādiṣu /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1206: atredaṃ saṃdihyate-kiṃ pūrvasminneva karmaṇi vājinaṃ guṇo vidhīyate uta karmāntaraṃ dravyadevatāntaraviśiṣṭamapūrvaṃ vidhīyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1208: dravyadevatāntaraviśiṣṭakarmāntaravidhau vidhigauravaprasaṅgāt karmāntarāpūrvāntarakalpanāgauravaprasaṅgācca na karmāntaravidhānamapi tu pūrvasminneva karmaṇi vājinadravyavidhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1209: na cotpattiśiṣṭamikṣāguṇāvarodhāttatra vājinamalabdhāvakāśaṃ karmāntaraṃ gocarayatīti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1210: ubhayorapi vākyayoḥ samasamayapravṛtterāmikṣāvājinayorutpattau samaṃ śiṣyamāṇatvena nāmikṣāyāḥ śiṣṭatvam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1212: na ca vaiśvadevītyatra śrauta āmikṣāsaṃbandho viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ yena vājinasaṃbandhādvākyagamyādbalavānbhavedubhayorapi padāntarāpekṣapratītitayā vākyagamyatvāviśeṣāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1214: astu vā śrautatvaṃ tathāpi vājibhya iti padaṃ vājamannamāmikṣā tadeṣāmastīti vyutpattyā tatsaṃbandhino viśvāndevānupalakṣayati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1218: tathāpi vājinnitīneḥ sarvanāmārthe smaraṇāt saṃnihitasya ca sarvanāmārthatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh3u:1219: viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ ca viśvadevapadena saṃnidhāpanāttatpadapuraḥsarā evaite vājipadenopasthāpyā na tu sūryādityapadavatsvatantrāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1220: tathāca tadupalakṣaṇārthaṃ vājipadaṃ viśvadevopahitāmeva devatāmupalakṣayatīti na śabdāntaroddevatābhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1221: tataścāmikṣāsaṃbandhopajīvanena viśvebhyo vājinaṃ vidhīyamānaṃ nāmikṣayā bādhyate
GSP33brsvbh3u:1222: kintu tayā saha samuccīyata iti na karmāntaramapi tu vākyābhyāṃ dravyayuktamekaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1223: karma vidhīyata iti prāpta ucyate-syādetadevaṃ yadi vaiśvadevīti taddhitaśrutyāmikṣā nocyeta /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1224: taddhitasya tvasyeti sarvanāmārthe smaraṇāt saṃnihitasya ca viśeṣyasya sarvanāmārthatvāttatraiva taddhitasyāpi vṛttirnatu viśveṣu deveṣaṣu /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1227: nanvevaṃ sati kasmādvaiśvadevīśabdamātrādeva nāmikṣāṃ pratīmaḥ kimiti cāmikṣāpadamapekṣāmahe /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1230: idaṃ tu saṃnihitaviśeṣābhidhāyi tatsaṃnidhimapekṣamāṇaṃ saṃnidhāpakamāmikṣāpadamapekṣata iti kuta āmikṣāpadānapekṣa āmikṣāpratyayaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1232: ataśca satyāmapi padāntarāpekṣāyāṃ yatpadaṃ padāntarāpekṣamabhidhatte tatpramāṇabhūtaprathamabhāvipadāvagamyatvācchrautaṃ balīyaśca /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1236: evañca sati nityavadavagadhānapekṣasādhanabhāvāmikṣā na vācinadravyeṇa saha vikalpasamuccayau prāpsyati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1237: nacāśvatve nirīḍhatvādanapekṣavṛtti vājipadaṃ kathañcidyaugikaṃ sāpekṣāvṛtti viśvadevaśabdāṃ devatāṃ vaiśvadevīpadādāmikṣādravyaṃ pratyupasarjanībhūtāmavagatāmupalakṣayiṣyati
GSP33brsvbh3u:1240: prāmāṇike ca vidhikalpanāgaurave abhyupetavye eva pramāṇasya tattvaviṣayatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1241: tasmādyatheha pūrvakarmāsaṃbhavino guṇātkarmabheda evamihāpi pañcāgnividyāyāḥ ṣaḍagnividyā bhinnā,
GSP33brsvbh3u:1248: naca tānyeva karmāṇi bhūmibhojanādijanitamupakāramākāṅkṣanti nākāṅkṣanti ceti yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1258: ca dhātubhedamantareṇa bhedānupapatteḥ 'samidho yajati'iti prathamabhāvinā vākyena
GSP33brsvbh3u:1266: tena prāthamyābhāvāt prāptamityeva nāstīti kasya ko 'nuvādaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1268: guṇaśravaṇe hi guṇaviśiṣṭakarmavidhāne vidhigauravabhiyā guṇamātravidhānalāghavāya karmānuvādāpekṣāyāṃ viparivṛtterupakāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1269: yathā 'dadhnā juhoti'iti dadhividhipare vākye viparivṛttyapekṣāyām 'agnihotraṃ juheti'iti vihitasya homasya
GSP33brsvbh3u:1273: agṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatayā ca kiṃvacanavihitakiṅkarmānuvādena kasya guṇavidhitvamiti na vinigamyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1275: yataḥ pūrvabuddhivicchedena vidhīyamānaṃ karma pūrvasmātsaṃjñāto vyavacchindyāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1277: pratipadyamānā ākhyātasyānuvādatve 'nuvādā vidhitve vidhayo na tu svātantryeṇa kasyacidīśate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1279: bhindāno bhāvanāṃ bhinatti yathā tathā śākhāntaravihitā api vidyāḥ śākhāntaravihitābhyo
GSP33brsvbh3u:1295: sarvavedāntapratyayāni sarvavedāntapramāṇānivijñānāni tasmiṃstasmin vedānte tāni tānyeva bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1299: atra ca codyata iti codanā puruṣaprayatnaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1302: tasya devatoddeśena tyāgasyāsecanādikasyāvacchedyaḥ puruṣaprayatnaḥ sa eva śākhāntare
GSP33brsvbh3u:1303: yathaivamihāpi prāṇajyeṣṭhatvaśreṣṭhatvavedanaviṣayaḥ puruṣaprayatnaḥ sa eva śākhāntareṣvapīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1306: yathā yāgasya yadekasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ dravyadevatārūpaṃ tadeva śākhāntareṣvapīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1311: yathotpannasya tasya sarvatra pratyabhijñāyamānatvādiha tvagniṣūtvapattigata eva guṇabheda iti kathaṃ vaiśvadevīvanna bhedaka iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1316: pañcaiva sāṃpādikā agnayo vājasaneyināmapi chāndogyānāmiva vidhīyante /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1318: vaiśvadevyāṃ tūtpattau guṇo vidhīyata iti bhavatu bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1321: vājasaneyināṃ ṣaṣṭhāgnividhānaṃ mā ca bhūcchāndogyānāṃ tathāpi pañcatvasaṃkhyāyā
GSP33brsvbh3u:1325: apratyabhijñāyamānāyāśca saṃkhyāyā anuvādyatvenānutpattervidhīyamānasya cādhikasya ṣoḍaśigrahaṇavadvikalpasaṃbhavānna śākhāntare jñānabhedaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1326: utpattiśiṣṭatve 'siddhe prāṇasaṃvādādayo 'pi bhavanti pratyabhijñānādabhinnāstāsu tāsu śākhāsviti //2//
GSP33brsvbh3u:1328: svādhyāyasya tathātvena hi samācāre 'dhikārāc ca savavac ca tanniyamaḥ / BBs_3,3.3 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1329: yairātharvaṇikagranthopāyā vidyā veditavyāṃ teṣāmeva śirovratapūrvādhyayanaprāptagranthabodhitā phalaṃ prayacchati nānyathā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1330: anyeṣāṃ tu chāndogyādīnāṃ saiva vidyā cīrṇaśirovratānāṃ phaladetyātharvaṇagranthādhyayanasaṃbandhādavagamyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1332: 'teṣāmevaitāṃ brahmavidyāṃ vadeta'iti vidyāsaṃyoge 'pyetāmiti prakṛtaparāmarśinā sarvanāmnādhyayanasaṃbandhāvirodhādātharvavihitaiva vidyocyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1333: savā homāḥ sapta sauryādayaḥ śataudanāntā atharvaṇikānāṃ ta ekasminnevārtharvaṇike 'gnau kriyante na tretāyām //3//
GSP33brsvbh3u:1337: bhūyobhūyo vidyaikatvasya vedadarśanādyatrāpi saguṇabrahmavidyānāṃ na sākṣādveda
GSP33brsvbh3u:1339: tathāhyagryaprāye likhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhavedayamagrya iti buddhiriti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1341: etā hi pauruṣeyyaḥ samākhyāḥ kāṭhakādipravacanayogāttāsāṃ śākhānāṃ na tūpāsanānām /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1342: nahyetāḥ kaṭhādibhiḥ proktā naca kaṭhādyanuṣṭhānamāsāmitarānuṣṭhānebhyo viśeṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1343: naca kaṭhaproktānimittamātreṇa granthe pravṛttau tadyogācca kathañcillakṣaṇayopāsanāsu pravṛttau saṃbhavantyāmupāsanābhidhānāmapyāsāṃ śakyaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1346: kaṭhādipuruṣapravacananimittāścaitāḥ samākhyāḥ kaṭhādibhyaḥ prāk nāsanniti tannibandhano jñānabhedo nāsīdidānīṃ cāstīti durghaṭamāpadyeta /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1349: yuktaṃ yadekaśākhāgato yajatyabhyāsaḥ samidādīnāṃ bhedaka iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1350: tatra hi vidhitvamautsargikamajñātajñāpanamapravṛttapravartanaṃ ca kupyeyātām 'śākhāntare tvadhyetṛpuruṣabhedādekatve 'pi nautsargikavidhitvavyākopa iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1351: aśaktirapi na bhedahetuḥ svādhyāyo 'dhyetavya iti svaśākhāyāmadhyayananiyamaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1354: yathādhvaryave karmaṇi jyotiṣṭomasya samāpti vyapadiśanti-'jyotiṣṭomaḥ samāptaḥ'iti tasmātsamāptibhedo 'pi na sādhanamupāsanābhedasya /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1355: tadevamasati bādhake codanādyaviśeṣātsarvavedāntapratyayāni karmāṇi tāni tānyeveti siddham //4//
GSP33brsvbh3u:1362: sarvaśākhāpratyayamekaṃ vijñānaṃ tathāpi śākhāntaroktānāṃ tadaṅgāntarāṇāṃ na śākhāntarokte tasminnupasaṃhāro bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1366: tasmādyathā naimittikaṃ karma sakalāṅgavadvihitamapi aśaktau yāvacchakyamaṅgamanuṣṭhātuṃ tāvanmātrajanyenopakāreṇaupakṛtaṃ bhavatyevamihāpyaṅgāntarāvidhānādeva bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1367: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-sarvatraikatve karmaṇaḥ sthite gṛhamedhīyanyāyena nopakārāvacchedo yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1368: nahi tadeva karma sattadaṅgamapekṣate nāpekṣate ceti yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1369: naimittike tu nimittānurodhādavaśyakartavye sarvāṅgopasaṃhārasya sadātanatvāsaṃbhavādupakārāvacchedaḥ kalpyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1371: iha tu śākhāntare katipayāṅgavidhānaṃ tāni vidhatte netarāṇi parisaṃcaṣṭe /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1373: tasmāttattvena karmaṇāṃ sarvāṅgasaṅgama autsargiko 'sati balavati bādhake nāpavadituṃ yukta iti //5//
GSP33brsvbh3u:1375: anyathātvaṃ śabdād iti cen nāviśeṣāt / BBs_3,3.6 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1377: tataḥ kānīyasā eva devā jyāyasā asurāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1380: śāstrayuktyaparikalpitamatayastāmasavṛttipradhānā asurā asubhiḥ prāṇairanindriyairagṛhītaisteṣu teṣu viṣayeṣu ramanta ityasurā ata eva te jyāyāṃsaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1390: ninditvā atha hemamāsanyamāsye bhavamāsanyaṃ mukhāntarbilasthaṃ mukhyaṃ prāṇaṃ prāṇābhimānavatīṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1392: tathetyabhyupagamya tebhya eva prāṇa udagāyat te 'surā viduranena prāṇenodgātrā no 'smān devā atyeṣyantīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1393: tamabhidrutya pāpmanāvidhyannasurā yathāśmānamṛtvā prāpya mṛttvālloṣṭo vā vidhvaṃsata evaṃ vidhvaṃsamānā viṣvañco 'surā vineśuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1405: ekatrodgātṛtvenocyate prāṇa ekatra codgānatvena kriyākartrośca sphuṭo bheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1410: ekasyāmapi śākhāyāṃ dṛṣṭametanna ca tatra vidyābheda ityāha-
GSP33brsvbh3u:1412: bahutararūpapratyabhijñānānugrahāya comityanenāpi udgīthāvayavena udgītha eva lakṣaṇīya iti pūrvapakṣaḥ //6//
GSP33brsvbh3u:1415: bahutarapratyabhijñāne 'pi upakramabhedāttanurodhena copasaṃhāravarṇanādekasminvākye tasyaiva codgīthasya punaḥpunaḥ saṃkīrtanāllakṣaṇāyāṃ ca
GSP33brsvbh3u:1423: evaṃ hi śrūyate-'vivā etaṃ prajayā paśubhirardhayati vardhayatyasya bhrātṛvyaṃ yasya
GSP33brsvbh3u:1424: havirniruptaṃ purastāccandramā abhyudeti sa tredhā taṇḍulānvibhajedye madhyamāḥ syustānagnaye
GSP33brsvbh3u:1425: dātre puroḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapedye sthaviṣṭhāstānindrāya pradātre dadhaṃścaruṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1426: ye kṣodiṣṭhāstān viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte carum'iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1427: tatra saṃdehaḥ-kiṃ kālāparādhe yāgāntaramidaṃ codyata uta teṣveva karmasu prakṛteṣu kālāparādhe nimitte devatāpanaya iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1428: eṣa tāvadatra viṣayaḥ-amāvāsyāyāmeva darśakarmārthaṃ vedikriyāgnipraṇayanakriyā vratādiśca yajamānasaṃskāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1431: yasya tu yajamānasya kutaścidbhramanibandhanāccaturdaśyāmevāmāvāsyābuddhau pravṛttaprayogasya candramā abhyudīyate tatredaṃ śrūyate-'yasya havirniruptam'iti
GSP33brsvbh3u:1432: tena yajamānenābhyuditenāmāvāsyāyāmeva nimittādhikāraṃ parisamāpya purastadahareva vedyuddharaṇādikarma kṛtvā pratipadi darśaḥ pravartayitavyaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1433: tatrābhyudaye kiṃ naimittikamidaṃ karmāntaraṃ darśāccodyata uta tasminneva darśakarmaṇi pūrvadevatāpanayanena devatāntaraṃ vidhīyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1435: yadi hi pūrvadevatābhyo havīṃṣi vibhajediti śrūyate tatastānyeva havīṃṣi devatāntareṇa
GSP33brsvbh3u:1436: yujyamānāni na karmāntaraṃ gamayitumarhanti kintu prakṛtameva karma taddhaviṣkamapanītapūrtadevatākaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1438: atra punastredhā taṇḍulān vibhajediti haviṣa eva madhyamādikrameṇa vibhāgaśravaṇādanapanītā
GSP33brsvbh3u:1439: haviṣi pūrvadevatā iti pūrvadavatāvaruddhe haviṣi devatāntaramalabdhāvakāśaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1442: pūrvasmin karmaṇi dadhnastaṇḍulānāṃ payasastaṇḍulānāṃ cendrādidevatā saṃbandhaśca vidhātavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1443: carutvaṃ cātra vihitaṃ nāstīti tadapiva vidhātavyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1445: karmāntaraṃ tvapūrvaṃ śakyamekenaiva prayatnenānekaguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ vidhātumiti nimitte karmāntarameva vidhīyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1446: darśastu lupyate kālāparādhāditi prāpta ucyate-na karmāntaram /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1449: bhavedetadevaṃ yadā tredhā taṇḍulān vibhajediti taṇḍulānāṃ tredhā vibhāgavidhānaparametadvākyaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1450: syādapi tu vākyāntaraprāptaṃ taṇḍulānāṃ tredhātvamanūdya vibhajedityetāvadvidhatte
GSP33brsvbh3u:1451: tatra vākyāntarālocanayā pūrvadevatābhya iti gamyate taṇḍulāniti tvavivakṣitaṃ havirubhayatvāvat /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1452: tathā ca ye madhyamā ityādīni vākyānyapanīte pūrvavat devatāsaṃbandhe haviṣastasminneva karmaṇyapratyūhaṃ devatāntarasaṃbandhaṃ vidhātuṃ śaknuvanti
GSP33brsvbh3u:1453: tathāca dravyamukhena prakṛtamukhapratyabhijñānāt devatāntarasaṃbandhe 'pi na karmāntarakalpanābhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1454: tataśca samāpte 'pi naimittikādhikārasiddhyarthaṃ tānyeva punaḥ karmāṇyanuṣṭheyāni /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1456: prakṛte hi karmaṇi taṇḍulapeṣaṇaprathanaṃ puroḍāśapākādi dadhipayasī ca prāptāni
GSP33brsvbh3u:1457: tatrābhyudayanimitte dadhiyuktānāṃ payoyuktānāṃ ca taṇḍulānāṃ vibhajediti vākyena
GSP33brsvbh3u:1458: pūrvadevatāpanayaṃ kṛtvā ye madhyamā ityādibhirvākyairdevatāntarasaṃbandhaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1460: iti puroḍāśanivṛttau tadarthasya prathanasyāpi nivṛttiranivṛttastu pāko 'pavādābhāvāttathā cārthaprāptaścodyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1463: tasmāttadevedaṃ karma na tu karmāntaramiti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1467: 'ṣṭhākapālaṃ nirvapedye madhyamāstān viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte caruṃ ye kṣodiṣṭhāstanindrāya
GSP33brsvbh3u:1469: atra hi amāvāsyāmiṣṭveti samāpte yāge paśukāmeṣṭividhānaṃ nātra pūrvasya karmaṇo 'nanuvṛtteryāgāntaravidhiriti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1472: parasmāt paro varācca varīyāniti parovarīyānudgīthaḥ paramātmarūpaḥ saṃpannaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1474: paramātmadṛṣṭimudgīthe bhavayitum 'ākāśo hyevaibhyo bhūtebhyo jyāyān'ityākāśaśabdena paramātmānaṃ nirdiśati //7//
GSP33brsvbh3u:1476: saṃjñātaś cet tad uktam asti tu tad api / BBs_3,3.8 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1479: saṃjñaikatvaṃ tu śrutibāhyatayā bahiraṅgaṃ ca pauruṣeyatayā sāpekṣaṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1485: yathā māṇavake 'nivṛttāyāmeva māṇavakabuddhivyapadeśavṛttau siṃhabuddhivyapadeśavṛttiḥ siṃho māṇavaka iti,
GSP33brsvbh3u:1486: evaṃ pratimāyāṃ vāsudevabuddhirnāmni ca brahmabuddhistathoṅkāra udgīthabuddhivyapadeśāviti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1491: vyākhyāyāṃ ca paryāyāṇamapi sahaprayogo yathā sindhuraḥ karī pikaḥ kokila iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1496: pratyanuvākaṃ pratyṛcamupakrame ca samāptau cokāraḥ sardavedavyāpīti kiṅgato 'yamoṅkārastattadāpyādiguṇaviśiṣṭastasmai
GSP33brsvbh3u:1501: dṛṣṭaśca samudāyaśabdo 'vayave lakṣaṇayā yathā grāmo dagdhaḥ paṭo dagdha iti tadekadeśadāhe /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1508: lakṣaṇāyā hi lakṣaṇīyaparatvaṃ padasya tasyaiva vākyārthāntarbhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1509: yathā gāṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa iti lakṣyamāṇasya tīrasya vākyārthe 'ntarbhāvo 'dhikaraṇatayā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1510: gaurvāhīka ityatra tu gosaṃbandhitīṣṭhanmūtrapurīṣādilakṣaṇayā na tatparatvaṃ gośabdasya /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1517: evaṃ hi vijñānāndayorapi sphuṭataraḥ pravṛttinimittabhedaḥ satyapi brahmaṇyaikārthye /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1524: saṃnidhānābhāvānna kauṣītakiprāṇasaṃvādavākye prāṇasya vasiṣṭhatvādibhirguṇairupāsyatvamapi tu jyeṣṭhatreṣṭhatvamātreṇeti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1525: siddhāntastu-satyaṃ saṃnihitaṃ parāmṛśati evaṅkāro na tu śabdopāttamātraṃ saṃnihitam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1526: kintu yacchabdābhihitārthanāntarīyakatayā prāptaṃ tadapi hi buddhau saṃnihitaṃ saṃnihitameva /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1529: parāmarśo yukta iti siddhaṃ kauṣītakibrāhmaṇagatena tāvadevaṅkāreṇa śakyate parāmraṣṭum /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1533: kevalasya śrutasya hāniritarasahitasya cākṣutasya kalpanā na cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1543: nahi brahmaṇo dharmiṇaḥ sattve kaścidviśeṣa iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1547: vidheyastu puruṣaprayatnatantraḥ puruṣaprayatnaśca yatra yāvadguṇaviśiṣṭe brahmaṇi coditaḥ sa tāvatyevāvatiṣṭhate nāvihitamapi guṇaṃ cotarīkartumarhati
GSP33brsvbh3u:1549: tasmādānandavijñānādayo brahmatattvātmatayoktā yatra yatra brahma śrūyate tatra tatrānuktā api labhyante /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1564: tatra pratyekamarthādiparatvapratipādanaśruteḥ śrūyamāṇatattatparatve ca saṃbhavati na tattadatikarme sarveṣāmekaparatvādhyavasānaṃ nyāyyam
GSP33brsvbh3u:1572: puruṣaṃ nirguṇaṃ prāpya kālasaṃkhyā na vidyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1575: vākyānīti prāptaya ucyate-indriyebhyaḥ parā hyarthā ityeṣa tāvatsaṃdarbho vastutattvapratipādanaparaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1578: tadatra yatpratyasya sākṣātprayojanavattvaṃ dṛśyate tatpratyayaparatvaṃ sarveṣām /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1593: puruṣaśabdavācyasya cātmanaḥ svayaṃ śrutyaiva duradhigamatvāvadhāraṇādvastutaśca duradhigamatvādarthādīnāṃ ca
GSP33brsvbh3u:1598: arthādiparatve tu svarūpeṇa vivakṣite nāpekṣitaṃ śrutirācaṣṭe ityāha-
GSP33brsvbh3u:1609: apica tābhyo gāmānayadityādayaśca vyavahāraḥ śrutyoktā viśeṣavatsvātmaparamātmasu prasiddhāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1611: ātmaśabdaprayogaścātrāpi dṛṣṭastasmādaparātmābhilāpo 'yamiti prāpta ucyati-paramātmano gṛhītiriha yathā itareṣu sṛṣṭiśravaṇeṣu 'etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ'ityādiṣu /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1613: etadabhisaṃhitam-mukhyaṃ tāvat sargātprākkevalatvamātmapadatvaṃ sraṣṭṛtvaṃ ca parameśvarasyātra bhavataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1616: ākāśapūrvikāyāṃ vastuto brahmaṇaḥ sṛṣṭau yathā kvacittejaḥpūrvakasṛṣṭyabhidhānaṃ na virudhyate 'etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ'iti darśanāt
GSP33brsvbh3u:1617: ākāśaṃ vāyuṃ sṛṣṭveti hi tatra pūrayitavyamevahāpi mahābhūtāni sṛṣṭveti kalpanīyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1618: sarvaśākhāpratyayatvena jñānasya śrutisiddhyarthamaśrutopalabdhau yatnavatā bhavitavyaṃ na punaḥ śrute mahābhūtāditve sargasya śaithilyamādaraṇīyam
GSP33brsvbh3u:1619: apica svādhyāyavidhyadhīnagrahaṇo vedarāśiradhyayanavidhyāpāditaprayojanavadarthamabhidadhāno yathā yathā prayojanādhikyamāpnoti tathā tathānumanyatetarām
GSP33brsvbh3u:1623: naca lokasargo 'pi hiraṇyagarbhavyāpāro 'pi tu tadanupraviṣṭasya paramātmana ityatraivoktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1625: bhedajātaṃ mahābhūtaiḥ sahānukamya brahmapratiṣṭhatvena brahmaṇa upasaṃhārādbrahmābhilāpatvamevāsyeti niścīyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1626: yatra tu puruṣavidhādiśravaṇaṃ tasya bhavettvanyaparatvaṃ gatyantarābhāvāditi sarvamavadātam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1629: tatra sacchabdasyāviśeṣeṇātmani cānātmani ca pravṛtternātmārthatvaṃ kintu samastavastvanugatasattāsāmānyārthatvaṃ tathā copakramabhedādbhinnārthatvam
GSP33brsvbh3u:1630: sa ātmā tattvamasīti copasaṃhāra upakramānurodhena saṃpattyarthatayā vyākhyeyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1632: tadvijñānena ca sarvavijñānaṃ mahāsāmānyasya sattāyāḥ samastavastuvistāravyāpitvādityevaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1633: prāpta ucyate-ātmagṛhītirvājasaneyināmiva chāndogyānāmapyuttarātsa ātmā tattvamasīti tādātmyopadeśāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1634: astu tāvadātmavyātiriktasya prapañcasya sadasattvābhyāmanirvācyatayā na sattvaṃ sattvaṃ tvātmadhātoreva tattvena nirvācyatvāttasmādātmaiva sanniti
GSP33brsvbh3u:1637: cānyatra ca sacchabdapravṛtteḥ saṃśaye satyupasaṃhārānurodhena sadevetyātmanyevāvasthāpyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1638: nītārthopakramānurodhena hyupasaṃhāravarṇanā na punaḥ saṃdigdhārthenopakrameṇopasaṃhāro varṇanīyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1641: na khalvākārādvṛkṣe jñāte śiṃśapādayastadviśeṣā jñātā bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1643: atra ca pūrvasmin pūrvapakṣe hiraṇyagarbhopāsanā siddhānte tu brahmabhāvaneti //16//
GSP33brsvbh3u:1645: anvayād iti cet syād avadhāraṇāt / BBs_3,3.17 / // 17 //
GSP33brsvbh3u:1650: ananaṃ prāṇanaṃ anaḥ prāṇaḥ taṃ prāṇamanagnaṃ kurvantaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1652: manyanta iti mananaṃ jñānaṃ tadvyānaparyantamiti cintanamuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1655: khuraravamātreṇāpātata ubhayavidhānapakṣaṃ gṛhītvā madhyamaṃ pakṣamālambate pūrvapakṣī-
GSP33brsvbh3u:1659: ayamabhisandhiḥ-yadyapi smārtaṃ prāyatyārthamācamanamasti tathāpi prāṇopāsanaprakaraṇe 'vidhānāttadaṅgatvenāprāptamiti vidhānamarthavadbhavati,
GSP33brsvbh3u:1660: anṛtavadanapratiṣedha iva smārte jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇe samāmnāto nānṛtaṃ vadediti pratiṣedho jyotiṣṭomāṅgatayārthavāniti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1671: iha tu smārtavācamanaṃ sakalakarmāṅgatayā vihitaṃ prāṇopāsanāṅgamapīti vyāpakena smārtenācamanavidhinā punaruktatvādanarthakam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1672: naca smārtasyānena paunaruktyaṃ tasya ca vyāpakatvādetasya ca pratiniyataviṣayatvāditi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1682: na cānagnatāsaṃkalpo 'nyataḥ prāpto yataḥ stāvako bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1685: api caikasya karmaṇa ekārthataivetyucitaṃ tasya balavatpramāṇavaśādananyagatitve satyanekārthatā kalpyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1686: saṃkalpe tu karmāntare vidhīyamāne nāyaṃ doṣa ityāha-
GSP33brsvbh3u:1690: yathā hi śvādimaryādasyānnasyāttumaśakyatvādannadṛṣṭiścodyate evamihāpyapāṃ paridhānāsaṃbhavāddṛṣṭireva codyata ityannadṛṣṭividhisāhacaryādgamyate
GSP33brsvbh3u:1691: aśabdatvaṃ ca yadyapi dṛṣṭyabhyavahārayostulyaṃ tathāpi dṛṣṭiḥ śābdadṛśyanāntarīyakatayā sākṣācchabdena kriyamāṇopalabhyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1693: kiñca chāndogyānāṃ vājasaneyināṃ cācamane prāyeṇācāmantīti vartamānāpadeśaḥ evaṃ yatrāpi vidhivibhaktistatrāpi jartilayavāgvavā vā juhuyāditivadvidhitvamavivakṣitam
GSP33brsvbh3u:1703: tasmātsamidho yajatītyādivadabhyāsādupāsanābheda iti prāpta ucyate-aikakarmyamekatvena pratyabhijñānāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1705: yatra bhūyāṃso guṇā yasya karmaṇo vidhīyante tatra tasya pradhānasya vidhiritaratra tu tadanuvādena katipayaguṇavidhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1706: yathā yatra chatracāmarapatākāhāstikāścīyaśaktikayāṣṭīkadhānuṣkakārpāṇikaprāsikapadātipracayastatrāsti rājeti gamyate na tu katipayagajavājipadātibhāji tadamātye, tathehāpi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1713: yadyekasyāmapi śākhāyāṃ tattvena pratyabhijñānādupāsanasya tatra vihitānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃkaraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1716: satyasya ca pradhānasya prakṛtatvādadhidaivamityasya viśeṣaṇatayopasarjanatvenāprastutvātprastutasya ca satyasyābhedātpūrvavadguṇasaṃkaraḥ //20//
GSP33brsvbh3u:1720: satyaṃ yatra svarūpamātrasaṃbandho dharmāṇāṃ śrūyate tatraivaṃ svarūpasya sarvatra pratyabhijñāyamānatvāttanmātrasaṃbandhitvācca dharmāṇām /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1721: yatra tu saviśeṣaṇaṃ pradhānamavagamyate tatra saviśeṣaṇasyaiva tasya dharmābhisaṃbandho na nirviśeṣaṇasya nāpyanyaviśeṣaṇasahitasya /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1725: yathā cācāryasya gacchato 'nugamanaṃ vihitaṃ na tiṣṭhato bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh3u:1734: brahma bhūtānāṃ prathamaṃ tu jajñe tenārhati brahmaṇā spardhituṃ kaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1735: 'brahma jyeṣṭhaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni brahmajyeṣṭhā jajñe āsa /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1736: yadyapi tāsu tāsu śāṇḍilyādividyāsvāyatanabhedaparigraheṇādhyātmikāyatanatvaṃ saṃbhṛtyādīnāṃ guṇānāmādhidaikatvamityāyatanabhedaḥ pratibhāti,
GSP33brsvbh3u:1738: ca vidyāsvāyatanāśravaṇādantato brahmāśrayatayā sāmyena pratyabhijñāsaṃbhavāt saṃbṛtyādīnāṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1739: guṇānāṃ śāṇḍilyādividyāsu ṣoḍaśakalādividyāsu copasaṃhāra iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1740: rāddhāntastu-mithaḥ samānaguṇaśravaṇaṃ pratyabhijñāya yadvidyā apūrvānapi tatrāśrutānguṇānupasaṃhārayati
GSP33brsvbh3u:1742: yā tu kācidādhidaivikī vibhūtiḥ śāṇḍilyādividyāyāṃ śrūyate tasyāstatprakaraṇādhīnatvāttāvanmātraṃ grahīṣyate naitāvanmātreṇa saṃbhṛtyādīnanukraṣṭumarhati
GSP33brsvbh3u:1748: tasmātsaṃbhṛtiśca dyuvyāptiśca tadidaṃ saṃbhṛtidyuvyāptyapi cātaḥ pratyabhijñānābhāvānna śāṇḍilyādividyāsūpasaṃhriyata iti siddham //23//
GSP33brsvbh3u:1754: yajñasya svarūpaṃ yajamānastasya ca cetanatvādviduṣa iti sāmānādhikaraṇyasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1756: evaṃ prāpta ucyate yādṛśaṃ tāṇḍināṃ paiṅgināṃ ca puruṣayajñasaṃpādanaṃ tadāyuṣaśca tredhā
GSP33brsvbh3u:1765: ātmanastu cetanasya yajamānatvaṃ ca vidvattvaṃ copapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1766: tathā cāyamarthaḥ-evaṃ viduṣaḥ puruṣasya yaḥ saṃbandhī yajñaḥ tasya saṃbandhitayā
GSP33brsvbh3u:1767: yajamāna ātmā tathā cātmano yajamānatvaṃ ca vidvatsaṃbandhitā ca yajñasya mukhye
GSP33brsvbh3u:1768: syātāmitarathātmaśabdasya svarūpavācitve viduṣo yajñasyeti ca yajamāno yajñasvarūpamiti ca gauṇe syātām /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1770: tasmātpuruṣayajñatā taittirīye nāstīti tayā tāvanna sāmyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1771: naca patnīyajamānavedavidyādisaṃpādanaṃ taittirīyāṇāmiva tāṇḍināṃ paiṅgināṃ vā vidyate savanasaṃpattirapyeṣāṃ vilakṣaṇaiva /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1773: apica tasyaivaṃ viduṣa ityanuvādaśrutau satyāmanekārthavidhāne vākyabhedadoṣaprasaktirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1774: api ceyaṃ paiṅgināṃ tāṇḍināṃ ca puruṣayajñavidyāphalāntarayuktā svatantrā pratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1782: ātharvaṇikādyupaniṣadārambhe te te mantrāstāni tāni ca pravargyādīni karmāṇi samamnātīni /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1787: saphalā hi sarvā vidyā āmnātāstatsannidhau mantrāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1788: karmāṇi ca samāmnātāni 'phalavatsannidhāphalaṃ tadaṅgam'iti nyāyādvidyāṅgābhāvena vijñāyante /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1792: nahi yathā darśapūrṇamāsāvārabhya samidādayaḥ samāmnātāstathā kāñcidvidyāmārabhya mantrā vā karmāṇi vā samāmnātāni /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1794: naca śrutasvāṅgaparipūrṇā vidyā etānākāṅkṣitumarhati yena prakaraṇāpaditasāmānyasaṃbandhānāṃ saṃnidhirviśeṣasaṃbandhāyā bhavedityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1798: mantrāṇāṃ tu svādhyāyavidhyāpāditapuruṣārthabhāvānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca pravargyādīnāṃ svavidhyāpāditapuruṣārthabhāvānāṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1800: tatrāpi ca vidyānāṃ phalavattvāttādarthyamaphalānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1804: idaṃ khalu nivṛttākāṅkṣāyā vidyāyāḥ saṃnidhāne śrutamanākāṅkṣāyā sākāṅkṣasyāpi saṃbaddhumasāmarthyāttasyā apyākāṅkṣāmutthāpayati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1806: asamarthasya copakārakatvānupapatteḥ prakaraṇinaṃ prati upakārasāmarthyamātmanaḥ kalpayati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1807: naca satyapi sāmarthye tatra śrutyā aviniyuktaṃ sadaṅgatāmupagantumarhatītyanayā paramparayā saṃnidhiḥ śrutimarthāpattyā kalpayati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1813: yadyapi ca pravargyo na kiñcidārabhya śrūyate tathāpi vākyasaṃyogena kratusaṃyogena kratusaṃbandhaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1816: yadyapi jyotiṣṭomavikṛtāvapi santyupasadastathāpi tatrānumānikyo jyotiṣṭome tu pratyakṣavihitāstena śīghrapravṛttitayā jyotiṣṭomāṅgataiva vākyenāvagamyate
GSP33brsvbh3u:1817: apica prakṛtau vihitasya pravargyasya codakenopasadvattadvikṛtāvapi prāptiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1826: yathā 'agnaye tvā juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmi'iti mantre agnaye nirvapāmiti pade karmasamavetārthaprakāśake /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1827: śiṣṭānāṃ tu padānāṃ tadekavākyatayā yathākathañcidvyākhyānamevamihāpi hṛdayapadasyopāsanāyāṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1828: samavetārthatvāttadanusāreṇa tadekavākyatāpannāni padāntarāṇi gauṇyā lakṣaṇayā ca
GSP33brsvbh3u:1830: naca mantraviniyogo nopāsaneṣu dṛṣṭo yenātyantādṛṣṭaṃ kalpyata ityāha-
GSP33brsvbh3u:1832: yadyapi vākyena balīyasā saṃnidhirdurbalo bādhyate tathāpi virodhe sati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1834: vākyena viniyuktasyāpi jyotiṣṭome pravargyasya saṃnidhinā vidyāyāmapi viniyogasaṃbhavāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1835: yathā 'brahmavarcasakāmo bṛhaspatisavena yajeta'iti brahmavarcasaphalo 'pi bṛhaspatisavo vājapeyāṅgatvena codyate-vājapeyeneṣṭvā bṛhaspatisavena yajeteti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1836: atra hi ktvaḥ samānakartṛkatvamavagamyate dhātusaṃbandhe pratyayavidhānāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1837: dhātvarthāntarasaṃbandhaśca kathaṃ ca samānaḥ kartā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1842: guṇapradhānabhāvamantareṇaikaprayogatā saṃbandhaśca tatrāpi vājapeyasya prakaraṇe samāmnānādvājapeyaḥ pradhānam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1845: nahyetadvacanaṃ kasyaciddarśapūrṇamāsasya somasya vā prakaraṇe samāmnātam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1846: tathāca dvayoḥ sādhikāratayā agṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatayā guṇapradhānabhāvaṃ prati vinigamanābhāvenādhiṣṭhānamātravivakṣayā lākṣaṇikaṃ samānakartṛkatvamityadoṣaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1849: tathā sati dvayorapi pṛthagadhikāratayā pratītaṃ samapradhānatvamatyaktaṃ bhaveditarathā tu guṇapradhānabhāvena tattyāgo bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1864: yajñaṅgatve siddhe jaghanyo vidyāsaṃnidhiḥ kiṃ kariṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1865: evamanyeṣāmapi śvetāśva ityevamādīnāṃ keṣāñcilliṅgena keṣāñcicchutyā keṣāñcitpramāṇāntareṇa prakaraṇeneti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1869: tatra tu śrutiliṅgayoḥ samavāye samānaviṣayatvalakṣaṇe virodhe kiṃ balīya iti cintā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1872: śruteśca gārhapatyamiti dvitīyāto gārhapatyasya śeṣitvaṃ aindryeti catṛtīyāśruteraindryā ṛcaḥ śeṣatvamavagamyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1873: yadyapi gārhapatyamiti dvitīyāśruterāgneyīmṛcaṃ prati gārhapatyasya śeṣitvenopapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1874: yadyapi caindryeti ca tṛtīyāśruteraindryā indraṃ prati śeṣatvanopapatteravirodhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1875: padāntarasaṃbandhe tu vākyasyaiva liṅgena virodho na tu śruteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1878: dvitīyātṛtīyāśrutī hi kārakavibhaktitayā kriyāṃ prati prakṛtyarthasya karmakaraṇabhāvamavagamayata iti viniyojike /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1879: kriyāṃ prati hi karmaṇaḥ śeṣitvaṃ karaṇasya ca śeṣatvamiti hi viniyogaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1880: padāntarānapekṣe ca kriyāṃ prati śeṣaśeṣitve śrutimātrātpratiyete iti śraute /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1884: tasmādvākyalabhyaṃ viśeṣamapekṣya śrautaḥ śeṣaśeṣibhāvo liṅgena virudhyata iti śrutiliṅgavirodhe
GSP33brsvbh3u:1885: kiṃ liṅgānuguṇena gārhapatyamiti dvitīyāśrutiḥ saptamyarthe vyākhyāyatāṃ gārhapatyasamīpe
GSP33brsvbh3u:1888: prabhavati hi svocitāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ gārhapatya itīndra indrateraiśvaryavacanatvāditi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1890: no khalu yatrāsamarthaṃ tacchrutisahasreṇāpi tatra viniyoktuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1897: tasmāddārudahanasyeva dahanasya saliladahane viniyogo gārhapatye viniyoga aindryāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1900: tasmādaindryendra eva gārhapatyasamīpa upasthātavya iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-'liṅgajñānaṃ purodhāya na śrutervinayoktṛtā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1902: yadi hi sāmarthyamavagamya śruterviniyogamavadhārayetpramātā tataḥ śruterviniyogaṃ prati liṅgajñānāpekṣatvāddurbalatvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1905: avagate tu tato viniyoge nāsamarthasya sa iti tannirvāhāya sāmarthyaṃ kalpyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1908: viniyoge tu siddhe tadanyathānupapattyā paścātpratīyata iti śrutiviniyogātparācīnā sāmarthyapratītistadanurodhenāvasthāpanīyā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1909: liṅgaṃ tu na svato viniyojakamapi tu viniyokīṃ kalpayitvā śrutim /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1910: tathāhi-na svarasato liṅgādanenendra upasthātavya iti pratīyate,
GSP33brsvbh3u:1911: kintvīdṛgindra iti tasya tu prakaraṇāmnānasāmarthyāt sāmānyataḥ prakaraṇāpatitaidamarthyasya
GSP33brsvbh3u:1915: nahi trayo 'tra brahmaṇāḥ kaṭhakauṇḍinyāviti vākyaṃ pramāṇāntaropasthāpitena māṭhareṇopapādayanti,
GSP33brsvbh3u:1924: śrutyā gārhapatye viniyogaḥ siddha iti nivṛttākāṅkṣaṃ prakaraṇamiti kasyānupapattyā
GSP33brsvbh3u:1929: tasmātpratītaśrautaviniyogopapattyai mantrasya sāmarthyaṃ tadanuguṇatvena nīyamānaṃ prathamāṃ vṛttimajahajjaghanyayāpi neyamiti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1930: liṅgavākyayoriha virodho yathā-'syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi ghṛtasya dhārayā suśevaṃ kalpayāmi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1932: kimayaṃ kṛtsna eva mantraḥ sadanakaraṇe puroḍāśāsādane ca prayoktavya uta kalpayāmyanta upastaraṇe tasmintsīdetyevamādistu puroḍāśāsādana iti
GSP33brsvbh3u:1933: yadi vākyaṃ balīyaḥ kṛtsno mantra ubhayatra,
GSP33brsvbh3u:1934: suśevaṃ kalpayāmītyetadapekṣo hi tasminsīdetyādiḥ pūrveṇaikavākyatāmupaiti yatkalpayāmi tasmintsīdeti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1935: atha liṅgaṃ balīyastataḥ kalpyāmyantaḥ sadanakaraṇe tatprakāśane hi tatsamartham /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1938: liṅgādvākyaṃ balīya ityubhayatra kṛtsnasya viniyoga iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1939: iha hi yattatpadasamabhivyāhāreṇa vibhajyamānasākāṅkṣatvādekavākyatāyāṃ siddhāyāṃ tadanurodhena paścāttadabhidhānasāmārthyaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1940: yathā devasyatvetimantre 'gnye nirvapāmīti padayoḥ samavetārthatvena tadekavākyatayā padāntarāṇāṃ tatparatvena tatra sāmarthyakalpanā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1941: tadevaṃ pratītaikavākyatānirvāhāya tadanuguṇatayā sāmarthyaṃ kḷptaṃ sanna tadvyāpādayitumarhati, api tu
GSP33brsvbh3u:1943: tathā ca vākyasya liṅgato balīyastvātsadanakaraṇe ca puroḍāśāsādhane ca kṛtsna eva mantraḥ prayoktavya iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1945: tu avadhṛtasāmarthyānāṃ padānāṃ praśliṣṭapaṭhitānāṃ sāmarthyavaśena prayojanaikatvenekavākyatvāvadhāraṇam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1946: yāvanti padāni pradhānamekamarthamavagamayituṃ samarthāni vibhāge sākāṅkṣāṇi tānyekaṃ vākyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1949: tayośca sadanakaraṇaṃ kalpayāmyanto mantraḥ samarthaḥ prakāśayituṃ puroḍāśāsādanaṃ ca tasminsīdetyādiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1950: tataśca yāvadekavākyatāvaśena sāmarthyamanumīyate tāvatpratītaṃ sāmarthyamekaikasya bhāgasyaikaikasminnarthe viniyojikāṃ śrutiṃ kalpayati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1951: tathāca śrutyaivaikaikasya bhāgasyaikatra viniyoge sati prakaraṇapāṭhopapattau na
GSP33brsvbh3u:1952: vākyakalpitaṃ liṅgaṃ viniyojikāṃ śrutimaparāṃ kalpayitumarhatītyekavākyatābuddhirutpannāpyābhāsībhavati liṅgena bādhanāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1953: yatra tu virodhakaṃ liṅgaṃ nāsti tatra samavetārthaikadvitripadaikavākyatā padāntarāṇāmapi sāmarthyaṃ kalpayatīti bhavati vākyasya viniyojakatvam
GSP33brsvbh3u:1957: atra ca padānāṃ parasparāpekṣāvaśātkasmiṃścidviśiṣṭa ekasminnarthe paryavasitānāṃ vākyatvaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:1958: labdhavākyabhāvanāṃ ca punaḥ kāryāntarāpekṣāvaśena vākyāntareṇa saṃbandhaḥ prakaraṇam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1959: kartavyāyāḥ khalu phalabhāvanāyā labdhadhātvarthakaraṇāyā itikartavyatākāṅkṣāyā vacanaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1963: tadetasmin svapadagaṇena kiyatyapyarthe paryavasite karaṇopakāralakṣaṇakāryāntarāpekṣāyāṃ 'samidho yajati'ityādivākyāntarasaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1964: samidādibhāvanā hi svavidhyupahitāḥ puruṣe hitaṃ bhāvyamapekṣamāṇā viśvajitryāyena vānuṣaṅgato vārthavādato vā phalāntarāpratilambhena darśapūrṇamāsabhāvanāṃ nirvārayitumīśate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1965: tasmāttadākāṅkṣāyāmupanipatitānyetāni vākyāni svakāryāpekṣāṇi tadapekṣitakaraṇopakāralakṣaṇaṃ kāryamāsādya nirvaṇvanti ca nirvārayanti ca pradhānam
GSP33brsvbh3u:1969: tāśca na mitha ekavākyatāṃ gantumarhantīti liṅgena paurṇamāsīyāgādindrāgnīśabda utkraṣṭavyaḥ amāvāsyāyāṃ ca samavetārthatvātprayoktavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1970: athedānīṃ saṃdihyate-kiṃ yadindrāgnipadaikavākyatayā pratīyate 'avivṛdhethāṃ maho jyāyo 'kātām'iti tannotkraṣṭavyamutendrāgniśabdābhyāṃ sahotkraṣṭavyamiti
GSP33brsvbh3u:1971: tatra yadi prakaraṇaṃ balīyastato 'panītadevatāko 'pi śeṣaḥ prayoktavyo 'tha vākyaṃ tato yatra devatāśabdastatraiva prayoktavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1976: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-bhavedetadevaṃ yadi viniyojyasvarūpasāmarthyamanapekṣya prakaraṇaṃ viniyojayet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1977: api tu viniyogāya tadapekṣate 'nyathā pūṣādyanumantraṇamantrasya dvādaśopasattāyāśca notkarṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1980: tatra yadi tadrūpaṃ śrutyā liṅgena vākyena vānyatra viniyuktaṃ tataḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1983: atha svasya śīghrapravṛttaṃ śrutyādi nāsti tataḥ prakaraṇaṃ viniyojakam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1989: yāvaditaratra vākyena sāmarthyaṃ tāvaditaratra sāmarthyena śrutiryāvaditaratra sāmarthyena
GSP33brsvbh3u:1990: śrutistāvadiha śrutyā viniyogastāvatā ca vicchinnāyāmākāṅkṣāyāṃ śrutyanumāne vihate
GSP33brsvbh3u:1991: prakaraṇenāntarā kalpitaṃ vilīyanta iti vākyabalīyastvāttaddevatāśeṣaṇāmapakarṣa eveti siddham //
GSP33brsvbh3u:1999: gāmānaya prāsādaṃ paśyeti gāmityasya kriyāmātrāpekṣiṇaḥ paśyetyanenāpi saṃbandhasaṃbhavādvinigamanābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2003: ayameti putro rājñaḥ puruṣo 'pasāryatāmityatra rājña ityasya putrapuruṣapadasaṃnidhānāviśeṣānmā bhūdavinigamanā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2005: atra putraśabdasya saṃbandhivacanatayā samutthitākāṅkṣasyāntike yadupanipatitaṃ saṃbandhyantarākāṅkṣaṃ padaṃ tasya tenaivākāṅkṣāparipūrteḥ puruṣapadena
GSP33brsvbh3u:2009: tathā cākāṅkṣitamapi na yāvatsaṃnidhāpyate tāvanna saṃbadhyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2010: tathā saṃnihitamapi yāvannākāṅkṣyate na tāvatsaṃbadhyata iti dvayoḥ saṃbandhaṃ prati
GSP33brsvbh3u:2013: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-rājasūyake kathaṃbhāvāpekṣā hi pavitrādārabhya kṣatrasya dhṛtiṃ yāvadanuvartate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2015: anirjñātaphalaṃ karma tasya prakaraṇāṅgatā 'iti nyāyādrājasūyāṅgatā śaunaḥśepopākhyānādīnām /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2016: abhiṣecanīyasya tu svavākyopāttapadārthanirākāṅkṣasya saṃnidhipāṭhenākāṅkṣotthāpanīyā yāvattāvatsiddhākāṅkṣeṇa rājasūyenaikavākyatā kalpyate
GSP33brsvbh3u:2018: tadupakāratayā sāmarthyalakṣaṇaṃ liṅgaṃ yāvaccābhiṣecanīyaikavākyatayā liṅgaṃ kalpyate
GSP33brsvbh3u:2019: tāvatkḷptaliṅgaṃ viniyokrīṃ śrutiṃ kalpyati yāvadvākyakalpitena liṅgena śrutiritaratra
GSP33brsvbh3u:2020: kalpyate tāvatkḷptayā śrutyā viniyoge sati prakaraṇapāṭhopapattau saṃnidhānaparikalpitamantarā vilīyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2023: tasmātprakaraṇavirodhe kramasya bādha eva naca vikalpo durbalatvāditi siddham //
GSP33brsvbh3u:2024: kramasamākhyayorvirodhodāharaṇam-pauroḍāśika iti samākhyāte kāṇḍe sānnāyyakrame ca śundhadhvaṃ daivyāya karmaṇa iti śundhanārtho mantraḥ samāmnātaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:2025: tatra saṃdihyate kiṃ samākhyānasya balīyastvātpuroḍāśapātrāṇāṃ śundhane viniyoktavyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:2028: samākhyānāṃ balīya iti pauroḍāśikaśabdena hi puroḍāśasaṃbandhīnītyucyante tānyadhikṛtya pravṛttaṃ kāṇḍaṃ pauroḍāśikam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2031: śrutyaiva sākṣādeva sa pratipādita iti arthaviprakarṣeṇa kramātsamākhyaiva balīyasīti
GSP33brsvbh3u:2032: puroḍāśapātraśundhane mantraḥ prayoktavyaḥ na sānnāyyapātraśundhana iti prāptam /
