GSP33brsvbh3u:2034: tathāhi-samākhyā na tāvatsaṃbandhasya vācikā kintu pauroḍāśaviśiṣṭaṃ kāṇḍamāha /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2035: tadviśiṣṭatvānyathānupapattyā tu saṃbandhaḥ kāṇḍasyānumīyate na tu sākṣānmantrabedasya /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2037: na cāsau saṃbandho 'pi śrutyaiva śeṣaśeṣibhāvaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2044: sānnāyyakramaḥ sānnāyyaṃ prati prakaraṇādyanumānadvāreṇa viniyogaṃ kalpayitumutsahate na tu samākhyānam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2046: tathāhi-samākhyā saṃbandhanibandhanā sati tatsidhyarthaṃ saṃnidhimupakalpayati yāvattādvaidikena pratyakṣadṛṣṭena saṃnidhānenākāṅkṣā kalpyate
GSP33brsvbh3u:2047: yāvacca kḷptena saṃnidhānenākāṅkṣā kalpyate tāvaditaratra kḷptayākāṅkṣayaikavākyatā yāvacca kḷptayākāṅkṣaikavākyatā tāvaditaratraikavākyatayā kḷptayopakārasāmarthyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2049: yāvadatra liṅgena viniyojikā śrutistāvaditaratra kḷptayā śrutyā viniyoga iti tāvataiva
GSP33brsvbh3u:2050: prakaraṇapāṭhopapatteḥ sarvaṃ samākhyānakalpitaṃ vicchinnamūlatvāllūyamānaśasyamiva nirbījaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2055: tatrāpi ca 'bādhikaiva śrutirnityaṃ samākhyā bādhyate sadā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2058: tadvayaṃ vistarādbibhyato 'pi prathamatantrānabhijñānukampayā nighnā vistare patitāḥ sma ityuparamyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2059: tasmādyathānujñāpanānujñayoḥ prajñātakramayorupahūta upahūyasvetyevaṃ mantrāvāmnātau deśasāmānyāttathaivāṅgatayā prāpnutaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2060: upahūta iti liṅgato 'nujñāmantro nānujñāpane upahūyasveti ca liṅgato 'nujñāpano ca mantro nānujñāyām /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2061: tadiha liṅgena kramaṃ bādhitvā viparītaṃ śeṣatvamāpādyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2062: yāvaddhi sthānena prakaraṇamutpādyaikavākyatvaṃ kalpyate tāvalliṅgena śrutiṃ kalpayitvā sādhito viniyoga iti akalpitaliṅgaśruteḥ kramasya bādhaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2063: tadvadihāpi viniyoge pratyekāntaritena liṅgena caturantaritasya vidyākramasya bādha iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2064: yadyapi prathamatantra evāyamartha upapāditastathāpi virodhe tadupapādanamiha tvavirodhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2067: athaiva pratītivirodho naca vastuvirodhaḥ sa vidyāyāṃ viniyoge 'pi tulyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2073: upapādite tu śrutyādibhi prakaraṇapāṭhe kṣīṇatvādarthāpatteḥ kramo na
GSP33brsvbh3u:2076: saṃyogapṛthaktvena viniyuktamapi viniyojayantī na śakyā śrutyantareṇa niroddhuṃ svapramāmiti vaiṣamyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2080: tulyabalatayā bṛhaspatisavasya tulyatāśaṅkāpākaraṇadvāreṇa samuccayo na tu pṛthaguktitayā parasparāpekṣatvāditi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2084: hānau tūpāyanaśabdaśeṣatvāt kuśāc chandaḥstutyupagānavat tad uktam / BBs_3,3.26 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2085: yatra hānopāyane śrūyete tatrāvivādaḥ saṃnipāte yatrāpyupāyanamātraśravaṇaṃ tatrāpi nāntarīyakatayā hānamākṣiptamityasti saṃnipātaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2086: yatra tu hānamātraṃ sakṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ śrutaṃ na śrūyate upāyanaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:2097: nanu yathopāyanaṃ śrutaṃ hānamupasthāpayatyevaṃ hānamapi upāyanamityata āha-
GSP33brsvbh3u:2099: grahaṇaṃ hi na svāmino 'pagamamantareṇa bhavatīti grahaṇādapagamasiddhiravaśyaṃbhāvinī /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2100: apagamastvasatyapyanyena grahaṇe dṛṣṭo yathā prāyaścittenāpagatirenasa iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2104: ayamasyārthaḥ-karmāntare vihitaṃ hi na karmāntara upasaṃhriyate pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2105: yatpunarna vidhīyate kintu stutyarthaṃ siddhatayā saṃkīrtyate tadasati bādhake devatādhikaraṇanyāyena śabdataḥ pratīyamānaṃ parityaktumaśakyam
GSP33brsvbh3u:2107: vidyāyāmaśvaromādivatkiṃ bhavatvityākāṅkṣāyāṃ na tāvatprāyaścitteneva tadvilayasaṃbhavastathā satyaśvaromarāhudṛṣṭāntānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2112: tasmādarthavādasyāpekṣāyāṃ śabdasaṃnidhikṛto 'pi viśeṣa upāyanaṃ buddhau saṃnidhāpayituṃ śaknotyapekṣāṃ pūrayitumiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2120: yadyapyanyadīye api sukṛtaduṣkṛte anyasya phalaṃ prayacchataḥ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:2121: yathā putrasya śrāddhakarma pitustṛptiṃ yathā ca piturvaiśvānarīyeṣṭiḥ putrasya /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2123: tathāpyanyadīye api sukṛtaduṣkṛte sākṣādanyasminna saṃbhavata ityāśayena śaṅkā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2129: prayojanaṃ copāsake sauhārdamācaritavyaṃ na tvasauhārdamiti chanda evācchanda ācchādanādācchando bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2141: 'api tu vākyaśeṣaḥ syādanyāyyatvādvikalpasya vidhīnāmekadeśaḥ syāt'ityetadeva sūtramarthadvāreṇa paṭhati-
GSP33brsvbh3u:2142: api tu vākyaśeṣatvāditaraparyudāsaḥ syātpratiṣedhe vikalpaḥ syātsa cānyāyya iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2143: evaṃ kila śrūyate-'eṣa vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatiryajñe yajñe 'nvāyatta'iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2147: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ vidhipratiṣedhayorvikalpa uta paryudāso 'nuyājavarjiteṣu yeyajāmahaḥ kartavya iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2149: dṛṣṭaṃ hi tādātvikīmasya sundaratāṃ gamayati nāyatau doṣavattāṃ niṣedhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2151: niṣedhaśāstraṃ tu tādātvikaṃ saundaryamabādhamānameva pravṛttyunmukhaṃ naraṃ nivārayadāyatyāmasya duḥkhaphalatvamavagamayati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2153: tato rāgataḥ pravṛttamapyāyatyāṃ duḥkhato bibhyataṃ puruṣaṃ śaknoti nivārayitumiti balīyān śāstrīyaḥ pratiṣedho gārataḥ pravṛtteriti na tayā vikalpamarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2159: naca vācyaṃ yāvadyajatiṣu yeyajāmahakaraṇaṃ yāvadyajatisāmānyadvāreṇānuyājaṃ yajativiśeṣamupasarpati
GSP33brsvbh3u:2160: tāvadanuyājagatena niṣedhena tanniṣiddhamiti śīghrapravṛtteḥ sāmānyaśāstrādviśeṣaniṣedho balavāniti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2161: yato bhavatvevaṃvidhiṣu brāhmaṇebhyo dadhi dīyatāṃ takraṃ kauṇḍinyāyeti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2162: tatra takravidhirna dadhividhimapekṣate pravartitumiha tu prāptipūrvakatvāpratiṣedhasya yeyajāmahasya cānyato 'prāptestanniṣedhena niṣedhaprāptyai tadvidhirapekṣaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2163: naca sāpekṣatayā niṣedhādvidhireva balīyānityatulyaśiṣṭatayā na vikalpaḥ kintu niṣedhasyaiva bādhanamiti sāṃprataṃ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:2177: tenāṣṭādoṣaduṣṭo 'pi vikalpa āsthīyate pakṣe 'pi prāmāṇyānmā bhūtpramatagītateti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2179: evaṃ hi tadā nañaḥ saṃbandho 'nanuyājeṣu yajatiṣvanuyājavartiteṣu yeyajāmahaḥ kartavya iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2190: yathā hi sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoramūrtayoḥ kalpanaṃ nāñjasaṃ mūrtyanuvidhāyitvātkampasya /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2192: tasmādyatra vidhūnanamātraṃ śrutaṃ tatra kampanena varaṃ svakāryārambhāccālanamātrameva lakṣyatāṃ na tu tato 'pagatyānyatra saṃcāraḥ kalpanāgauravaprasaṅgāt
GSP33brsvbh3u:2193: tasmātsvakāryārambhāccālanaṃ vidhūnanamiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-yatra tāvadupāyanaśrutistatrāvaśyaṃ tyāgo vidhūnanaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2194: kvacidapi cedvidhūnanaṃ tyāge vartate tathā satyanyatrāpi tatraiva vartitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2195: evaṃ hi na varteta yadi vidhūnanamiha mukhyaṃ labhyeta /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2205: sāṃparāye tartavyābhāvāt tathā hy anye / BBs_3,3.27 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2214: taditi hi sarvanāma tasmādarthe sannihitaparāmarśakaṃ tasya hetubhāvamāha /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2221: nahi tatra jīvanniti vā jīvata iti vā śrutam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2223: evañca na paryaṅkavidyātastatprakṣaya iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2224: rāddhāntastu vidyāsāmarthyavidhūtakalmaṣasya jñānavata uttareṇa pathā gacchato brahmaprāptirna cāprakṣīṇakalmaṣasyottaramārgagamanaṃ saṃbhavati
GSP33brsvbh3u:2228: vidyaiva tādṛśī kalmaṣaṃ kṣapayati kṣapitakalmaṣaṃ cottaramārgaṃ prāpayatīti kathamardhapathe kalmaṣayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2237: aśva iva romāṇi vidhūyeti hi svatantrasya puruṣasya vyāpāraṃ brūte,
GSP33brsvbh3u:2243: nanu yathā paretasyottareṇa pathā brahmaprāptirbhavatīti vidyāphalamevaṃ tasyaivārdhapathe sukṛtaduṣkṛtahānirapi bhaviṣyatīti śaṅkāpadāni tebhya uttaramidaṃ sūtram /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2248: sukṛtaduṣkṛtaprakṣayastu satyapi naraśarīre saṃbhavatīti samarthasya hetoryamaniyamādisahitāyā vidyāyāḥ karyakṣayāyogādyukto jīvata eva sukṛtaduṣkṛtakṣaya iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2254: evaṃ kāraṇānantaraṃ kāryotpāde sati nimittanaimittakayostadbhāvasyopapattistāṇḍiśāṭhyāyaniśrutyośca saṃgatiritarathā svātantryābhāvenāsaṃgatiruktā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2256: ye tu parasya viduṣaḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛte kathaṃ paratra saṃkrāmata iti śaṅkottaratayā sūtraṃ vyācakhyuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2261: gater arthavattvam ubhayathānyathā hi virodhaḥ / BBs_3,3.29 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2263: yatrāpi kevalā hāniḥ śrūyate tatrāpi upāyanamupasthāpayatyevaṃ tatsannidhāveva devayānaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2264: panthāḥ śruta iti yatrāpi sukṛtaduṣkṛtahāniḥ kevalā śrutā tatrāpi devayānaṃ panthānamupasthāpayitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2267: tasmāddhānimātre devayānaḥ panthāḥ saṃbadhyata iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2268: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-vidvān puṇyapāpe vidhūyanirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaitīti hi viduṣo vidhūtapuṇyapāpasya vidyayā kṣemaprāptimāha /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2271: nahi jātu rajjau sarpabhramanivṛttaye samutpannaṃ rajjutattvajñānaṃ deśaviśeṣamapekṣate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2275: yadi paramārabdhakāryakarmakṣapaṇāya śarīrapātāvadhyapekṣeti na devayānenāstīhārtha iti śrutidṛṣṭavirodhānnāpekṣitavya iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2276: asti tu paryaṅkavidyāyāṃ tasyārtha ityuktaṃ dvitīyena sūtreṇeti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2277: ye tu yadi puṇyamapi nivartate kimarthā tarhi gatarityāśaṅkya sūtramavatārayanti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2279: yadi punaḥ puṇyamanuvarteta brahmalokagatasyāpīha puṇyaphalopabhogāyavṛttiḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2281: tasmādduṣkṛtasyeva sukṛtasyāpi prakṣaya iti taiḥ punaranāśaṅkanīyamevāśaṅkitam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2282: vidyākṣiptāyāṃ hi gatau keyamāśaṅkā yadi kṣīṇasukṛtaḥ kimarthamayaṃ yātīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2288: yadi tu tannādriyate tato darśapūrṇamāsajyotiṣṭomādidharmāḥ saṃkīryeran /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2289: naca teṣāṃ vikṛtiṣu sauryādiṣu dvādaśāhādiṣu codakataḥ prāptiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2293: na caivaṃ sati śrutyādayo 'pi viniyojakāsteṣāmapi hi prakaraṇena sāmānyasaṃbandhe sati viniyojakatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2294: yatrāpi vināprakaraṇaṃ śrutyādibhyo viniyogo 'vagamyate tatrāpi tannirvāhāya prakaraṇasyāvaśyaṃ kalpanīyatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2297: tasmādyāsvevopāsanāsu devayānaḥ pitṛyāṇo vā panthā āmnātastāsveva na tūpāsanāntareṣu tadanāmnānāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2298: naca 'ye ceme 'raṇye śraddhātapa ityupāsate'iti sāmānyavacanātsarvavidyāsu tatpathaprāptiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2301: apicaivaṃ satyekasyāṃ vidyāyāṃ mārgopadeśaḥ sarvāsu vidyāsvityekatraiva mārgopadeśaḥ kartavyo na vidyāntare /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2304: evaṃ prāpte ucyate-'ye ceme 'raṇye śraddhātapa ityupāsate'iti na śraddhātapomātrasya
GSP33brsvbh3u:2305: pathiprāptimāhāpi tu vidyayā tadārohantītyatra nāvidvāṃsastapasvina iti kevalasya
GSP33brsvbh3u:2308: tathānyatrāpi pañcāgnividyādhikāre 'bhidhīyate-'ya evametādvidurye cāmī araṇye śraddhāṃ satyamupāsate'iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2315: etaduktaṃ bhavati-bhavetprakaraṇaṃ niyāmakaṃ yadyaniyamapratipādakaṃ vākyaṃ śrautaṃ smārtaṃ vā na syādasti tu tattasya ca prakaraṇādbalīyastvam
GSP33brsvbh3u:2316: tasmādaniyamo vidyāntareṣvapi saguṇeṣu devayānaḥ panthā asakṛnmārgopadeśasya ca prayojanaṃ varṇitaṃ bhāṣyakṛteti //31//
GSP33brsvbh3u:2319: saguṇāyāṃ vidyāyāṃ cintāṃ kṛtvā nirguṇāyāṃ cintayati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2329: naca 'tāvadevāsya ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye 'tha saṃpatsye'iti śruterviduṣo dehapātāvadhipratīkṣāvadvasiṣṭhādīnāmapi prārabdhakarmaphalopabhogapratīkṣeti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2330: yena hi karmaṇā vasiṣṭhādīnāmārabdhaṃ śarīraṃ tatpratīkṣā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2341: nirguṇāyāṃ vidyāyāmapavargalakṣaṇaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ na stutimātratayā vyākhyāyamucitam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2345: naca viduṣāmapāntaratamaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ tattaddehasaṃtārātsatyāmapi brahmavidyāyāmanirmokṣānna brahmavidyā mokṣasya heturiti sāmpratam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2346: hetorapi sati pratibandhe kāryānupajano na hetubhāvamapakāroti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2347: nahi vṛntaphalasaṃyogapratibaddhaṃ gurutvaṃ na patanamajījanaditi pratibandhāpagame tatkurvanna taddhetuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2348: naca na setupratibandhānāmapāṃ nimnadeśānabhisarpaṇamiti setubhede na nimnamabhisarpanti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2349: tadvadihāpi vidyākarmārādhanāvarjiteśvaravihitādhikārapadapratibaddhā brahmavidyā yadyapi na muktiṃ dattavatī tathāpi tatparisamāptau pratibandhavigame dāsyati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2350: yathā hi prārabdhavipākasya karmaṇaḥ prakṣayaṃ pratīkṣamāṇaścaramadehasamutpannabrahmasākṣātkāro 'pi dhriyate 'tha tatprakṣayānmokṣaṃ prāpnoti
GSP33brsvbh3u:2358: yo hi paravaśo dehaṃ parityājyate dehāntaraṃ ca nītaḥ pūrvajanmānubhūtasya smarati sa janmavāñjātismaraśca /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2359: gṛhādiva gṛhāntare svecchayā kāyāntaraṃ saṃcaramāṇo na jātismara ākhyāyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2362: yadi hyupayukte sakṛtpravṛtte prārabdhavipāke karmaṇi karmāntaramaprārabdhavipākamiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2366: nahisamāne vināśahetau kasyacidvināśo nāparasyeti śakyaṃ vaditum /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2370: tasya tāvadeva ciramiti śrutiprāmāṇyādanāgataphalameva karma kṣīyate na pravṛttaphalamityavagamyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2371: apica nādhikāravatāṃ sarveṣāmṛṣīṇāmātmatattvajñānaṃ tenāvyāpako 'pyayaṃ parvapakṣa ityāha-
GSP33brsvbh3u:2377: apica svargādāvanubhavapathamanārohati śabdaikasamadhigamye vicikitsā syādapi mandadhiyāmāmuṣmikaphalatvaṃ prati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2378: yathā cārthavādaḥ-'ko hi tadveda yadamuṣmiṃlloke 'sti vā na veti' /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2381: advaitatattvasākṣātkāro hi avidyāsamāropitaṃ prapañcaṃ samūlaghātaṃ nighnanghoraṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2384: nanu tattvamasi vartasa iti vākyaṃ kathamanubhavameva dyotayatītyata āha-
GSP33brsvbh3u:2389: akṣagaviṣayāṇāṃ pratiṣedhadhiyāṃ sarvavedavartinīnāmavarodha upasaṃhāraḥ pratiṣedhasāmānyādakṣarasya tadbhāvapratyabhijñānāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2390: ānandādayaḥ pradhānasyetyatrāyamartho yadyapi bhāvarūpeṣu viśeṣaṇeṣu siddhastantryāyatayā ca niṣedharūpeṣviti siddha eva /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2397: tadaṅgatvena yajurveda eva 'ya evaṃ vidvānvāravantīyaṃ gāyati ya evaṃ vidvānyajñāyajñīyaṃ gāyati ya evaṃ vidvānvāmadevyaṃ gāyati'iti vihitam
GSP33brsvbh3u:2401: prayoktavyānyatha yatra viniyujyante tatratyenopāṃśutvena svareṇa 'uccaiḥ sāmnopāṃśu yajuṣā iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2403: utpattividhinaivāpekṣitopāyatvātmanā vihitatvādaṅganāṃ tasyaiva prāthamyāttannibandhana evoccaiḥsvare prāpta ucyate-
GSP33brsvbh3u:2407: copāṃśutvaṃ so 'yaṃ virodho vyatikramastasminvayatikrame mukhyena pradhānena niyujyamānatvarūpeṇa
GSP33brsvbh3u:2413: ekasyaiva vidherutpattiviniyogādhikāraprayogarūpeṣu caturṣu madhye kiñcideva rūpaṃ kenacidvākyenollikhyate yadanyato 'prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2414: tatra yadyapi sāmavede sāmāni vihitāni tathāpi tadvākyānāṃ tadutpattimātraparatā viniyogasya yājurvaidikaireva vākyai prāptatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2416: bhavantīti tatra yena vākyena viniyujyante tasyaiva svarasya sādhanatvaṃsaṃsparśino
GSP33brsvbh3u:2420: adhvaryupradānake 'pi puroḍāśe viniyuktatvātpradhānānurodhenādhvaryuṇaiva teṣāṃ prayogo nodgātreti dārṣṭāntike yojayati-
GSP33brsvbh3u:2430: saṃdehe hi vākyaśeṣānnirṇayo naca mukhyalākṣaṇikagrahaṇaviṣayo viṣayaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsvbh3u:2432: prakaraṇasya ca tato balīyasā vākyena bādhanāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2433: tasmādvedyabhedādvidyābheda iti prāpta ucyate-dvāsuparṇetyatra ṛtaṃ pibantāvityatra ca dvitvasaṃkhyotpattau pratīyate tena samānatautsargikī
GSP33brsvbh3u:2434: pibantāviti dvayoḥ pibantā yā sā bādhanīyā,
GSP33brsvbh3u:2435: sā copakramopasaṃhārānurodhena na dvayorapi tu chatrinyāyena lākṣāṇikī vyākhyeyā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2436: yena hyupakramyate yena copasaṃsthiyate tadanurodhena madhyaṃ jñeyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2437: yathā jāmitvadoṣasaṃkīrtanopakrame tatpratisamādhānopasaṃhāre ca saṃdarbhe madhyapātino
GSP33brsvbh3u:2442: apica triṣvapyeteṣu vedānteṣu prakaraṇatraye 'pi paurvāparyaparyālocanayā paramātmavidyaivāvagamyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2445: nāsyāṃ jīvaḥ pratipādyate kintu paramātmano 'bhedaṃ jīvasya darśayitumasāvanūdyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2450: kauṣītakeyakaholacākrāyaṇoṣastapraśnopakramayorvidyornairantaryeṇāmnātayoḥ kimasti bhedo na veti viśaye bheda eveti bhrūmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2453: na caikasyaiva tāṇḍināṃ navakṛtva upadeśe 'pi yathā bhedo na bhavati 'sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo'ityatra tathehāpyabheda iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2455: iti hi tatra śrūyate tenābhedo yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2458: tathāpyekatra tasyaivāśanāyādimātrātyayopādherupāsanādekatra ca kāryakaraṇavirahopādherupāsanādvidyābheda eveti prāpte pratyucyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2462: vastusvarūpaṃ tu punaḥpunarucyamānamapi na doṣamāvahati śatakṛtvo 'pi hi pathyaṃ vadantyāptāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2467: ubhābhyāmapi vidyābhyāṃ bhinna ātmā pratipādyate iti yo manyate pūrvapakṣaikadeśī taṃ prati sarvāntaratvavirodho darśitaḥ //35//
GSP33brsvbh3u:2469: anyathā bhedānupapattir iti cen nopadeśāntaravat / BBs_3,3.36 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2476: evaṃ hi nikṛṣṭa utkṛṣṭo bhavatīti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2483: nanvevamutkṛṣṭasya nikṛṣṭatvaprasaṅga ityuktaṃ tatkimidānīṃ saguṇe brahmaṇyupāsyamāne 'sya vastuto nirguṇasya nikṛṣṭatā bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2484: kasmaicitphalāya tathā dhyānamātraṃ vidhīyate na tvasya nikṛṣṭatāmāpādayatīti cedihāpi vyatihārānucintanamātramupadiśyate phalāya na tu nikṛṣṭatā bhavatyutkṛṣṭasya /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2489: tadvai tadetadeva tadāsa satyameva sa yo haitanmahadyakṣaṃ prathamajaṃ vedaṃ satyaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2490: brahmeti jayatīmāṃllokāñjita ityasāvasadya evametanmahadyakṣaṃ prathamajaṃ veda satyaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2492: pūrvoktasya hṛdayākhyasya brahmaṇaḥ satyamityupāsanamanena saṃdarbheṇa vidhīyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2502: kiñca jito vaśīkṛta inuśabda itthaṃśabdasyārthe vartate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2510: kasmiṃnnālambane tadupāsanīyamityata uttaram-sa ādityo ya eṣa ityādinā tasyopaniṣadaharahamiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2511: hanti pāpmānaṃ jahāti ca ya evaṃ vedetyantena /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2519: tathāca śrutiḥ-'tadetadakṣaraṃ satyamiti sa ityekamakṣaraṃ tītyekamakṣaraṃ yamityekamakṣaraṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2520: prathamottame akṣare satyaṃ madhyato 'nṛtaṃ tadetadanṛmubhayataḥ satyena parigṛhītaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2524: atra hi prathamottame akṣare satyaṃ mṛtyurūpābhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2533: prakṛtānukarṣeṇābhedaḥ pratīyate tathāpi phalabhedena bhedaḥ sādhyabhedeneva nityakāmyaviṣayordarśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2534: svargakāmo yajeta yāvajjīvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeteti śāstrayoḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2535: satyapyanubandhābhede bheda iti prāpte pratyucyate-ekaiveyaṃ vidyā tatsatyamiti prakṛtaparāmarśādabhedena pratyabhijñānāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2537: tasyopaniṣadaharahamiti tasyaiva yadaṅgāntaraṃ rahasyanāmnopāsanaṃ tatpraśaṃsārthor'thavādo 'yaṃ na phalavidhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2543: tataśca vājasaneyoktānāṃ satyādīnāmupasaṃhāra ityatrārthe saiva hi satyādaya iti sūtraṃ vyākhyātaṃ tadetaddūṣayati-
GSP33brsvbh3u:2550: tathāhi chāndogye-'atha ya ihātmānamanuvidya vrajanti etāṃśca satyānkāmān'ityātmavatkāmānāmapi vedyatvaṃ śrūyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2551: vājasaneye tu nirguṇameva paraṃ brahmopadiśyate 'vimokṣāya brūhi'iti tathāpi tayoḥ parasparaguṇopasaṃhāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2555: vidyāyāmādhyātavyatvenaite coditā yenātrādhyeyatvena saṃbadhyerannapi tu satyakāmādiguṇanāntarīyakatvenaiteṣāṃ prāptirityupasaṃhāra ucyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2556: evaṃ vyavasthita eṣa saṃkṣepo 'dhikaraṇārthasya-sāmyabāhulye 'pyekatrākāśādhāratvasyāparatra cākāśatādātmyasya śravaṇādbhede vidyayorna parasparaguṇopasaṃhāra iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2557: rāddhāntastu sarvasāmyamevobhayatrāpyātmopadeśādākāśaśabdenaikatrātmokto 'nyatra ca daharākāśādhāraḥ sa evokta iti sarvasāmyādbrahmaṇyubhayatrāpi sarvaguṇopasaṃhāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2563: tena yadyapīyamupāsanāgocarā na cintā sākṣāttathāpi tatsaṃbaddhaprathamabhojanasaṃbandhādasti saṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2570: uktaṃ khalvetatprathama eva tantre 'padakarmāprayojakaṃ nayanasya parārthatvāt'ityanena /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2588: evaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtānyagnihotramupāsate'iti vacanādagnihotrasyātithīnbhūtāni pratyupajīvyatvena śravaṇāttadekavākyatayehāpi pūrvo 'tithibhyo 'śnīyāditi prāṇāhutipradhānaṃ lakṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2589: tadevaṃ sati 'yathāha vai svayamahutvāgnihotraṃ parasya juhuyādityevaṃ tat'ityatithibhojanasya
GSP33brsvbh3u:2590: prāthamyaṃ ninditvāsvāmibhojanaṃ svāminaḥ prāṇāgnihotraṃ prathamaṃ prāpayantī prāṇāgnihotrādaraṃ karoti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2591: nanvāthriyatāmeṣā śrutiḥ prāṇahutiṃ kintu svāmibhojanapakṣa eva nābhojane 'pītyata āha-
GSP33brsvbh3u:2592: yā hi na prāthamyalopaṃ sahate natarāṃ sā prāthamyavato 'gnihotrasya lopaṃ saheteti manyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2593: īdṛśaḥ khalvayamādaraḥ prāṇāgnihotrasya yadatithitibhojanottarakālavihitaṃ svāmibhojanaṃ samayādapakṛṣyātithibhojanasya purastādvihitam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2594: tadyadāgnihotrasya dharmiṇaḥ prāthamyadharmalopamapi na sahate śrutistadāsyāḥ kaiva kathā dharmilopaṃ sahata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2605: yathā jāghanyā patnīḥ saṃyājayantīti patnīsaṃyājānāṃ jāghanyekadeśadravyajuṣāṃ jāghanīprayojakatvam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2606: sa hi nāmāprayojako bhavati yasya prayojakagrahaṇamantareṇārtho na jñāyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2609: tasmādyathā jāghanyantareṇāpi paśūpādānaṃ paraprayuktaśūpajīvanaṃ vā khaṇḍaśo māṃsavikrayiṇo muṇḍādivadākṛtirūpādīyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2611: tasmānna bhojanasya lope prāṇāgnihotralopa iti manyate pūrvapakṣī /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2615: taddhomīyamiti hi vacana kimapi saṃnihitadravyaṃ home viniyuṅkte tadaḥ sarvanāmnaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2618: tacca saṃnihitaṃ bhaktaṃ bhojanārthamityuttarārdhātsviṣṭakṛte samavadyatītivanna bhaktaṃ vāpo vā dravyāntaraṃ vā prayoktumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2619: jāghanyāstvavayavabhedasya nāgnīṣomīyapaśvadhīnaṃ nirūpaṇaṃ svatantrasyāpi tasya sūnāsthasya darśanāttasmādastyetasya jāghanīto viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2622: vidhyuddeśagatasyāgnihotranāmnastathābhāvādārthavādikasya tu siddhaṃ kiñcitsādṛśyamupādāya stāvakatvenopapatterna tadbhāvaṃ vidhātumarhatītyāha-
GSP33brsvbh3u:2624: cāgnihotrasya codakato dharmaprāptāvabhyupagamyamānāyāṃ bahutaraṃ prāptaṃ bādhyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2632: na tu nadyāṃ cakravākādaya eva cakravākādinā saṃpādyante /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2635: yasminpakṣe dharmānavalopastasmindharmiṇo 'pi na tvetāvatā dharminityatā sidhyatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2636: nanvatithibhojanottarakālatā svāmibhojanasya vihiteti kathamasau bādhyata ityata āha-
GSP33brsvbh3u:2641: yathaiva 'yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavati na sa pāpaṃ ślokaṃ śṛṇoti'ityetadanārabhyādhītamavyabhicāritakratusaṃbandhaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2647: evañca sati kratau parṇatāniyamavadupāsanāniyama iti prāpte ucyate-yuktaṃ parṇatāyāṃ phalaśruterarthavādamātratvam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2655: na cātatparaṃ vākyaṃ jñāpayitumarhatīti tatra vākyatātparyamavaśyāśrayaṇīyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2656: tathāca tatparaṃ sanna parṇatāyāḥ phalasaṃbandhamapi gamayitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2658: upāsanānāṃ tu vyāpārātmatvena svata eva phalasaṃbandhopapatteḥ udgīthādyāśrayaṇaṃ phale vidhānaṃ na virudhyate viśiṣṭavidhānāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2668: tasmādyathā kratvāśrayāṇyapi godohanādīni phalasaṃyogādanityāni evamudgīthādyupāsanānīti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2678: tattacchrutyarthālocanayā vāyuprāṇayoḥ svarūpābhede siddhe tadadhīnanirūpaṇatayā tadviṣayopāsanāpyabhinnā na cādhyātmādhidaivaguṇabhedādbhedaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2693: nanvetasyai devatāyai iti devatāmātraṃ śrūyate na tu vāyustatkathaṃ vāyuprāptimāhetyata āha-
GSP33brsvbh3u:2695: vāyuḥ khalvagnyādīnsaṃvṛṇuta ityagnyādīnapekṣyānavacchinno 'gnyādayastutenaivāvacchinnā iti saṃvarṇaguṇatayā vāyuranavacchinnā devatā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2697: militānāṃ śravaṇāviśeṣādindrasya devatāyā abhedātrayāṇāmapi puroḍāśānāṃ sahapradānāśaṅkāyāmutpattivākya
GSP33brsvbh3u:2704: liṅgabhūyastvāt tad dhi balīyas tad api / BBs_3,3.44 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2707: yadyapi bhūyāṃsi santi liṅgāni manaścidādīnāṃ svātantryasūcakāni tathāpi na tāni svātantryeṇa svātantryaṃ prati prāpakāṇi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2710: na cedaṃ sāmarthyalakṣaṇaṃ liṅgaṃ yenāsya svātantryeṇa prāpakaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2716: tasmādasati sāmarthyalakṣaṇe viroddhari prakaraṇapratyūhaṃ manaścidādīnāṃ kriyāśeṣatāmavagamayati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2717: naca te haite vidyācita evetyavadhāraṇaśrutiḥ kriyānupraveśaṃ vārayati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2718: yena śrutivirodhe sati na prakaraṇaṃ bhavet,
GSP33brsvbh3u:2720: naca vidyayā haivaita evaṃvidaścitā bhavantīti puruṣasaṃbandhamāpādayadvākyaṃ prakaraṇamapabādhitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2723: tasmāttadapi na prakaraṇavirodhāyālamiti sāṃpādikā apyete agnayaḥ prakaraṇātkriyānupraveśina eva mānasavat /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2724: dvādaśāhe tu śrūyate-'anayā tvā pātreṇa samudraṃ rasayā prājāpatyaṃ manograhaṃ gṛhṇāmi'iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2725: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ mānasaṃ dvādaśāhā daharantaramuta tanmadhyapātino daśamasyāhnāṅgamiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2726: tatra vāgvai dvādaśāho mano mānasamiti mānasasya dvādaśāhādbhedena vyapadeśādvāṅmanasabhedavadbhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2727: nirdhūtāni dvādaśāhasya gatarasāni chandāṃsi tāni mānasenaivāpyāyantīti ca dvādaśāhasya mānasena stūyamānatvādbhede ca sati
GSP33brsvbh3u:2729: patnīsaṃyājāntatvāccāhnāṃ patnīḥ saṃyājya mānasāya prasarpantīti ca mānasasya patnīsaṃyājasya parastācchruteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2731: trayodaśatve 'hnāṃ siddhe dvādaśāha iti jaghanyayā vṛttyonnīyeta /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2737: patnīsaṃyājāntatā tu yadyapyautsargikī tathāpi daśamasyāhno viśeṣavacanānmānasāni grahaṇāsādanahavanādīni patnīsaṃyājātparāñci bhaviṣyanti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2739: eṣa vai daśamasyāhno visargo yanmānasamiti vacanāddaśamāharaṅgatā gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2740: visarge 'nto 'ntavato dharmo na svatantra iti daśame 'hani mānasāya pramarpantīti daśamasyāhna ādhāratvanirdeśācca tadaṅgaṃ mānasaṃ nāharantaramiti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2750: nahi sāṃpādikānāmagnīnāmiṣṭakāsu citenāgninā kiñcidasti sādṛśyamanyatra kriyānupraveśāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2755: tathā caitebhyo yādṛśor'thaḥ pratīyate tadanurūpa eva sa bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2756: pratīyate caitebhyo manaścidādīnāṃ sāntatyaṃ cāvadhāraṇaṃ ca phalabhedasamanvayaśca puruṣasaṃbandhaśca /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2757: na cāsya godohanādivatkratvarthāśritatvaṃ yena puruṣārthasya karmapāratantryaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2766: yaduktaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇā kratvaṅgatve pūrveṇeṣṭakācitena manaścidādīnāṃ vikalpa iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2768: apica pūrvāparayorbhāgayorvidyāprādhānyadarśanāttanmadhyapātino 'pi tatsāmānyādvidyāpradhānatvameva lakṣyate na karmāṅgatvamityāha sūtreṇa-
GSP33brsvbh3u:2774: yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta bārhaspatyaṃ madhye nidhāyāhutiṃ hutvābhidhārayedyadi vaiśyo vaiśvadevaṃ yadi rājanya aindramiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2776: kiṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ prāptānāṃ nimittārthena śravaṇamuta brāhmaṇādīnāmayaṃ yāgo vidhīyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2777: tatra yadi prajāpālanakaṇṭakoddharaṇādi karma rājyaṃ tasya kartā rājeti rājaśabdasyārthastato rājā rājasūyena yajeteti rājyasya kartū rājasūye 'dhikāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2778: tasmātsaṃbhavantyaviśiṣeṇa brāhmaṇakṣatriyavaiśyā rājyasya kartāra iti siddhaṃ sarvaṃ evaite rājasūye prāptā iti 'yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta'ityevamādayo nimittārthāḥ śrutayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2779: atha tu rājñaḥ karma rājyamiti rājakartṛyogāttatkarma rājyaṃ tataḥ ko rājetyapekṣāyāmāryeṣu
GSP33brsvbh3u:2781: kṣatriyajātau rājaśabdaprasiddhistadavadhāraṇakāraṇamiti kṣatriya eva rājeti na brāhmaṇavaiśyayoḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2782: prāptiriti rājasūyaprakaraṇaṃ bhittvā brāhmaṇādikartṛkāṇi pṛthageva karmāṇi prāpyanta
GSP33brsvbh3u:2787: tathāhi-brāhmaṇādiṣu prajāpālanakartṛṣu kanakadaṇḍātapatraśvetacāmarādilāñchaneṣu rājapadamāndhrāścāryāścāvivādaṃ prayuñjānā dṛśyante /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2791: nīyamānatvādrajyasya kartā rājeti siddhe nimittārthāḥ śrutayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2793: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-'rūpato na viśeṣo 'sti hyāryamlecchaprayogayoḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2795: tadiha rājaśabdasya karmayogādvā kartari prayogaḥ kartṛprayogādvā karmaṇīti viśaye
GSP33brsvbh3u:2801: tatkartaryatajjātau rājaśabdo gauṇa iti kṣatriyasyaivākārādrājasūye tatprakaraṇamapodyāveṣṭerutkarṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2802: anvayānurodhī yadiśabdo na tvapūrvavidhau sati tamanyathayitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2804: iyaṃ ca rājasūyādadhikārāntarametayānnādyakāmaṃ yājayediti nāstītikṛtvā cintā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2815: pareṇa ca śabdasya tādvidhyaṃ bhūyastvāt tv anubandhaḥ / BBs_3,3.52 / // 52 //
GSP33brsvbh3u:2828: nasūtrakāreṇa tatroktaṃ yena punaruktaṃ bhavedapi tu bhāṣyakṛtetyatratyasyaivārthasyāpakarṣaḥ pramāṇalakṣaṇopayogitayā tatra kṛta iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2829: yata iha sūtrakṛdvakṣyatyata eva bhagavatopavarṣeṇoddhāro 'pakarṣasya kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2834: nanvātmāstitvopapattaya evātrocyantāṃ kiṃ tadākṣepeṇetyata āha-ākṣepapūrvikā hīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2837: yadyapi samastavyasteṣu pṛthivyaptejovāyuṣu na caitanyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathāpi kāyākārapariṇateṣu bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2838: nahi kiṇvādayaḥ samastavyastā na madanā dṛṣṭā iti madirākārapariṇatā na madayanti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2839: ahamiti cānubhave deha eva gaurādyakāraḥ prathate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2840: na tu tadatiriktaḥ tadadhiṣṭhānaḥ kuṇḍa eva dadhīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2842: na jātu dadhisamānādhikaraṇāni madhurādīni kuṇḍasyaikādhikaraṇyamanubhavanti sitaṃ madhuraṃ kuṇḍamiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2847: yadā ca upalabdhisādhyanāntarīyakabhāvasya liṅgasyeyaṃ gatistadā kaiva kathā dṛṣṭavyabhicārasya
GSP33brsvbh3u:2854: sa ca śarīrādhīnatayā dṛśyamānaḥ śarīradharma evaṃ prāṇaḥ śvāsapraśvāsādirūpaḥ śarīradharma eva /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2855: icchāprayatnādayaśca yadyapyāntarāḥ tathāpi śarīrātiriktasya tadāśrayānupalabdheḥ sati śarīre bhāvāt antaḥ śarīrāśrayā eva,
GSP33brsvbh3u:2861: nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamiti bruvāṇaḥ praṣṭavyo jāyate kuto bhavānanumānādīnāmaprāmāṇyamavadhāritavāniti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2871: naca liṅgaṃ pramāṇaṃ yata ete sidhyanti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2872: na puṃsāmitthaṃbhāvamavijñāya yaṃ kañcana puruṣaṃ pratipipātayiṣato 'navadheyavacanasya prekṣāvattā nāma /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2873: apica paśavo 'pi hitāhitaprāptiparihārārthinaḥ komalaśaṣpaśyāmalāyāṃ bhuvi pravartante /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2878: tadeva mā nāma bhūnnāstikasya janmāntaramasminneva janmanyupasthito 'sya mūkatvapravṛttinivṛttiviraharūpo mahānnarakaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2884: sūtrayojanā tu na tvavyatiriktaḥ kintu vyatirikta ātmā dehāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2888: tathāca ye bhūtaviśeṣaguṇāste yāvadbhūtabhāvino dṛṣṭā yathā rūpādayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2889: nahyasti saṃbhavaḥ bhūtaṃ ca rūpādirahitaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2892: prāṇaceṣṭādayo yadyapi dehadharmā eva tathāpi na dehamātraprabhavāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2894: tasmādyasyaite adhiṣṭhānāddehadharmā bhavanti sa dehātirikta ātmā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2898: svaparapratyakṣā hi dehadharmā dṛṣṭā yathā rūpādayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2904: apica madaśaktiḥ pratimadirāvayavaṃ mātrayāvatiṣṭhate tadvaddehe 'pi caitanyaṃ tadavayaveṣvapi mātrayā bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2906: naca bahūnāṃ cetanānāmanyonyābhiprāyānuvidhānasaṃbhava iti ekapāśanibaddhā iva bahavo vihaṅgamāḥ viruddhādikriyābhimukhāḥ samarthā api na hastamātramapi deśamatipatitumutsahante /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2921: yathā hi bhūtapariṇāmabhedo rūpādirna tu bhūtacatuṣṭayādarthāntaramevaṃ bhūtapariṇāmabheda eva caitanyaṃ na tu bhūtebhyor'thāntaraṃ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:2923: etaduktaṃ bhavati-caturṇāmeva bhūtānāṃ samastaṃ jagatpariṇāmo na tvasti tattvāntaraṃ yasya pariṇāmo rūpādayo 'nyadvā pariṇāmāntaramiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2926: bhūtadharmā rūpādayo jaḍatvādviṣayā eva dṛṣṭā na tu viṣayiṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2934: tasyāstataḥ svayaṃprakāśapratyayena bhūtadharmebhyo jaḍebhyo vailakṣaṇyena vyatirekaniścayāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2935: astu tarhi vyatirekādupalabdhirbhūtebhyaḥ svatantrā tathāpyātmani pramāṇābhāva ityata āha-
GSP33brsvbh3u:2940: evaṃ ca sati viṣayarūpatadbhedādeva sudurlabhāviti dūranirastā viṣayabhedādupalabdhibhedasaṃkathā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2947: nānātve hi nānyenopalabdhe 'nyasya puruṣasya smṛtirupapadyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2950: yo hi dehavyāpārādupalabdhirutpadyate tena dehadharma iti manyate taṃ pratīdaṃ dūṣaṇam-
GSP33brsvbh3u:2955: aṅgāvabaddhāstu na śākhāsu hi prativedam / BBs_3,3.55 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2958: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ yasminvede yadudgīthādayo vihitāsteṣāmeva tadvedavihitāḥ pratyayā utānyavedavihitānāmapyudgīthādīnāṃ te pratyayā iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2961: nirviśeṣasya ca tasyānupapatterviśeṣakāṅkṣāyāṃ svaśākhāvihitasya viśeṣasya saṃnidhānāttenaivākāṅkṣāvinivṛtterna śākhāntarīyamudgīthāntaramapekṣate
GSP33brsvbh3u:2963: yadi hi śrutisamarpitamarthamapabādhena tataḥ śrutiṃ pīḍayenna caitadasti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2966: kṛṣṇādi yadi muñcāmaḥ kā śrutistatra pīḍyate' //
GSP33brsvbh3u:2968: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-udgīthāṅgavabaddhāstu pratyayā nānāśākhāsu prativedamanuvarteranna pratiśākhaṃ vyavatiṣṭheran /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2969: udgīthamityādisāmānyaśruteraviśeṣāt etaduktaṃ bhavati-yuktaṃ śuklaṃ paṭamānayetyādau paṭaśrutimaviśeṣapravṛttāmapi saṃnidhānācchuklaśrutirbādhata iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2972: naca svārthamasmārayitvā viśiṣṭārthapratyāyanaṃ padānāmiti viśiṣṭārthaprayuktaṃ svārthasmāraṇaṃ na svaprayojakamapavādhitumutsahate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2973: mā ca vādhiprayojakābhāvena svārthasmāraṇamapīti yuktamaviśeṣapravṛttāyā api śruterekasminneva viśeṣe avasthāpanam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2986: bhūmnaḥ kratuvajjyāyas tvaṃ tathā hi darśayati / BBs_3,3.57 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2987: vaiśvānaravidyāyāṃ chāndogye kiṃ vyastopāsanaṃ samastopāsanaṃ ca utā samastopāsanameveti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2988: tatra divameva bhagavo rājanniti hovāceti pratyakamupāsanaśruteḥ pratyekaṃ ca phalavattvāmnānātsamastopāsane ca phalavattvaśruterubhayathāpyupāsanam
GSP33brsvbh3u:2989: naca yathā vaiśvānarīyeṣṭau yadaṣṭākapālo bhavatītyādīnāmavayujyavādānāṃ pratyekaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2996: iha tu samaste vyaste ca vartamānāpadeśasyāviśeṣādagṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatayā ubhayatrāpi vidhikalpanāyāḥ phalakalpanāyāśca bhedāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3005: tathā caikavākyatālābhāya vākyabhedaparihārāya ca samastopāsanaparataiva saṃdarbhasya lakṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3015: saṃprati tu sarvāsāmīśvaragocarāṇāṃ vidyānāṃ kimabhedo bhedo vā,
GSP33brsvbh3u:3017: nanu yathā pratyayābhidheyāyā apūrvabhāvanāyā ājānato bhedabhāve 'pi dhātvarthena nirūpyamāṇatvāttasya ca yāgāderbhedātprakṛtyarthayāgādidhātvarthānubandhabhedādbhedaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:3019: evaṃ vidyānāmapi rūpato vedyasyeśvarasyābhede 'pi tattatsatyasaṃkalpatvādiguṇopadhānabhedādvidyābheda iti nāstyabhedāśaṅkā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3021: iha brahmaṇaḥ siddharūpatvādguṇānāmapi satyasaṃkalpatvādīnāṃ tadāśrayāṇāṃ siddhatayā sarvatrābhedo vidyāsu /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3023: siṃhāsyo vṛṣaskandhaḥ sa evopadiśyamānaścakorekṣaṇatvādyapajahāti na khalu pratyupadeśaṃ vastu bhidyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3028: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-bhavedetadevaṃ yadi vastuniṣṭhānyupāsanavākyāni kintu tadviṣayāmupāsanābhāvanāṃ vidadhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3030: yadyapi copāsanābhāvanā upāsanādhīnanirūpaṇopāsanaṃ copāsyādhīnanirūpaṇamupāsyaṃ ceśvarādi vyavasthitarūpam,
GSP33brsvbh3u:3032: yathaikaḥ strīkāyaḥ kenacidbhakṣyatayā kenacidupagantavyatayā kenacidapatyatayā kenacinmātṛtayā kenacidupekṣaṇīyatayā viṣayīkriyamāṇaḥ puruṣecchātantraḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:3042: vidyābhede tu na paunaruktyamekasyāṃ vidyāyāmuktā vidyāntare noktā iti vidyāntarasyāpi tadguṇatvāya vaktavyā anuktānāmaprāpteriti //58//
GSP33brsvbh3u:3045: agnihotradarśapūrṇamāsādiṣu pṛthagadhikārāṇāmapi samuccayo dṛṣṭo niyamavāṃsteṣāṃ nityatvādupāsanāstu kāmyatayā na nityāstasmānnāsāṃ samuccayaniyamaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:3046: tena samānaphalānāṃ darśapūrṇamāsajyotiṣṭomādīnāmiva na niyamavānvikalpaḥ phalabhūmārthinaḥ samuccayasyāpi saṃbhavāditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3049: upāsanāntarābhyāse ca cittaikāgratāvyāghātena kasya cidupāsanāniṣpatteriha vikalpa eva niyamavāniti rāddhāntaḥ //59//
GSP33brsvbh3u:3051: kāmyās tu yathākāmaṃ samuccīyeran na vā pūrvahetvabhāvāt / BBs_3,3.60 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3059: iha tu satyapi puruṣārthatve kasmānnaikaprayogavacanagrahaṇaṃ bhavatīti pūrvoktamarthamākṣipan pratyavatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3060: yadyapi hi kāmyā etā upāsanāstathāpi na svatantrā bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3061: tathā sati hi kratvarthānāśritatayā kratuprayogādbahirapyamūṣāṃ prayogaḥ prasajyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3064: evaṃ cāśrayatantratvādāśritānāṃ prayogavacanenāśrayāṇāṃ samuccayaniyamenāśritānāmapi samuccayaniyamo yukta itarathā tadāśritatvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3065: sa ca prayogavacana upāsanāḥ samuccinvaṃstattatphalakāmanānāmavaśyaṃbhāvamākṣipati tadabhāve tāsāṃ samuccayaniyamābhāvāditi manvānasya pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3070: nahi kāmā vidhīyante yena samuccīyerannapi tūddiśyante /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3074: nityānityasaṃyogavirodhāt satyapi tadāśrayāṇāṃ nityatve idameva cāśrayatantratvamāśritānāṃ yadāśraye satyeva vṛttirnāsatīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3075: na tu tatra vṛttireva nāvṛttiriti tadidamuktam-āśrayatantrāṇyapi hīti //61//
GSP33brsvbh3u:3082: vedāntarohitapraṇavodgīthaikatvapratyayasāmarthyāddhotṛkarmaṇaḥ śaṃsanādudgātā pratisamādadhāti kiṃ tadityata āha durudgīthamapi vedāntarodite caudgātre karmaṇi utpannaṃ kṣatam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3092: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ tṛtīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3// ____________________________________________________________________________________________
GSP33brsvbh3u:3097: samprati tu kimaupaniṣadātmatattvajñānamapavargasādhanatayā puruṣārthamāho kratuprayogāpekṣitakartṛpratipādakatayā kratvarthamiti mīmāṃsāmahe
GSP33brsvbh3u:3098: yadā ca kratvarthaṃ tadā yāvanmātraṃ kratuprayogavidhināpekṣitaṃ kartṛtvamāmuṣmikaphalopabhoktṛtvaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:3099: ca na caitadanityatve ghaṭate kṛtavipraṇāśākṛtābhyāgamaprasaṅgādato nityatvamapi,
GSP33brsvbh3u:3103: yadyapi jīvānuvādena tasya brahmatvapratipādanaparatvamupaniṣadāmiti mahatā prabandhena
GSP33brsvbh3u:3104: tatra tatra pratipāditaṃ tathāpyatra keṣāñcitpūrvapakṣaśaṅkābījānāṃ nirākaraṇe tadeva
GSP33brsvbh3u:3107: yadyapi ca kartṛmātraṃ nāvyabhicāritakratusaṃbandhaṃ kartṛmātrasya laukikeṣvapi karmasu
GSP33brsvbh3u:3110: vedāntaiḥ pratipādyate na tādṛśasyāsti laukikeṣu karmasūpayogaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3112: āmuṣmikaphalānāṃ tu vaidikānāṃ karmaṇāṃ tamantareṇāsaṃbhavāttatsaṃbandha evāyamaupaniṣadaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:3118: priyādisūcitasya ca saṃsāriṇa evātmano draṣṭavyatvena pratijñāpanādapahatapāpmatvādi tu tadviśeṣaṇaṃ tasyaiva stutyartham /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3124: na tvetatprakṛtodgīthavidyāviṣayaṃ yadeva vidyayeti sarvanāmāvadhāraṇābhyāṃ vyāpteradhigamat /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3125: yathā ya eva dhūmavāndeśaḥ sa vahnimāniti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3126: samanvārambhavacanaṃ ca phalārambhe vidyākarmaṇoḥ sāhityaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3127: tacca yadyapyāpneyādiyāgaṣaṭkavatsamapradhānatvenāpi bhavati tathāpyuktayā yuktyā vidyāyāḥ karma pratyaṅgabhāvenaiva netavyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3128: vedārthajñānavataḥ karmavidhānādupaniṣado 'pi vedārtha iti tajjñānamapi karmāṅgamiti //1//
GSP33brsvbh3u:3130: śeṣatvāt puruṣārthavādo yathānyeṣv iti jaiminiḥ / BBs_3,4.2 / // 2 //
GSP33brsvbh3u:3145: yadi śarīrādyatiriktaḥ kartā bhoktātmetyetanmatra upaniṣadaḥ paryavasitāḥ syustataḥ syādevaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:3149: tathā caupaniṣadātmajñānasya kratvanuṣṭhānavirodhinaḥ kratusaṃbandha eva nāsti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3152: ata eva priyādisūcitena saṃsāriṇātmanopakramya tasyaivātmano 'dhikopadidīkṣāyāṃ paramātmanātyantābheda upadiśyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3153: yathā samāropitasya bhujagasya rajjurūpādatyantābhedaḥ pratipādyate yo 'yaṃ sarpaḥ sā rajjuriti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3161: yatha sarve brāhmaṇā bhojyantāmiti nimantritāpekṣayā teṣāmeva prakṛtatvāt //10//
GSP33brsvbh3u:3165: avibhāge 'pi na doṣa ityāha-na cedaṃ samanvārambhavacanamiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3172: tanmātravata evādhikāraḥ karmasu nopaniṣadadhyanavataḥ tadadhyayanasya karmasvanupayogāditi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3173: adhyayanamātravata eveti mātragrahaṇenārthajñānaṃ vā vyavacchinnamiti manvāno bhrāntaścodayati-nanvevaṃ satīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3184: apica vidyāphalaṃ pratyakṣaṃ darśayantī śrutiḥ kālāntarabhāviphalakarmāṅgatvaṃ vidyāyā nirākarotītyāha-kāmakāreṇa caike /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3199: nindati hi pratyakṣā śrutirāśramāntaraṃ 'vīrahā vā eṣa devānām'ityādikā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3200: pratyakṣaśrutivirodhe ca smṛtyācārayoraprāmāṇyamuktaṃ 'virodhe tvanapekṣaṃ syādasati hyanumānam'iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3205: na kevalamanyaparatayā parāmarśasyāśramāntaraṃ na labhyate api tvāśramāntaranindādvāreṇāpavādādapītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3208: ye ceme 'raṇya ityādibhyastvāśramāntaraṃ setasyatītyata āha-ye ceme 'raṇya iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3211: nahi tapa eva dvitīya ityatrāśramāntarābhidhāyī kaścidasti śabda iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3212: nanvetameva pravrājina iti vacanādāśramāntaraṃ setsyatītyata āha-tathaitameveti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3214: adhikaraṇārambhamākṣipya nāsti pratyakṣavacanamitikṛtvā cinteyamiti samādhatte-nanu brahmacaryādeveti //18//
GSP33brsvbh3u:3222: tatra skandhaśabdo yadyāśramaparo na syādapi tu samūhavacanastato dharmāṇāṃ yajñādīnāṃ prātisvikotpattīnāṃ kimapekṣya tritvasaṅkhyā suvyavasthāpyeta
GSP33brsvbh3u:3224: tatra yajñādiliṅgo gṛhāśrama eko dharmaskandho brahmacārīti dvitīyastapa iti ca,
GSP33brsvbh3u:3227: tasmādanyaparādapi parāmarśādaśramāntarāṇi pratīyamānāni devatādhikaraṇanyāyena na śakyante 'pākartum /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3228: naca pratyakṣaśrutivirodho vīrahā vetyādeḥ pratipannagārhasthyaṃ pramādādajñānādvāgnimudvāsayituṃ pravṛttaṃ pratyupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3229: evañca avirodhe siddhavatparāmarśādaśramāntarāṇāṃ śāstrāntarasiddhiṃ vā kalpayiṣyāmo
GSP33brsvbh3u:3230: yathopavītavidhipare vākye 'upavyayate devalakṣmameva tatkurute'ityatra nivītaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:3237: aparāmarśe ca stuterasaṃbhavena kiṃparatayā ekavākyatāstvitī tāṃ bhaṅktvā dhāraṇavadvaramapūrvatvādvidhirevāstu /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3238: yathā 'adhastātsamidhaṃ dhārayannanudravedupari hi devebhyo dhārayati'ityatra satyāmapyadhodhāraṇenaikavākyatāpratītau vidhīyata evoparidhāraṇamapūrvatvāt
GSP33brsvbh3u:3248: yadi tāvadbrahmasaṃstha iti padaṃ pratyastamitāvayavārthaṃ parivrājake 'śvakarṇādipadavadrūḍhaṃ tadāśramaprāptimātreṇaivāmṛtībhāva iti na tadbhāvāyā brahmajñānamapekṣeta /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3253: evañca caturṣvāśrameṣu yasyaiva brahmaṇi niṣṭhatvamāśramiṇaḥ sa brahmasaṃstho 'mṛtatvametīti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3254: tatra tāvadbrahmacārigṛhasthau svaśabdābhihitau tapaḥpadena ca tapaḥpradhānatayā bhikṣuvānaprasthāvupasthāpitau /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3257: yadi tāvatkarmayogaḥ karmitā sā bhikṣorapi kāyavāṅmanobhirasti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3258: atha ye na brahmārpaṇena karma kurvanti kintu kāmārthitayā te karmiṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3259: tathā sati gṛhasthādayo 'pi brahmārpaṇena karma kurvāṇā na karmiṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3260: tasmādbrahmaṇi tātparyaṃ brahmaniṣṭhatā na tu karmatyāgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3262: tapasā ca dvayorāśramayorekīkaraṇena traya iti tritvamupapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3263: evañca trayo 'pyāśramā abrahmasaṃsthāḥ santaḥ puṇyalokabhājo bhavanti yaḥ punareteṣu brahmasaṃsthaḥ so 'mṛtatvabhāgiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3265: yathā devadattayajñadattau mandaprajñāvabhūtāṃ saṃprati tayoryajñādattastu śāstrābhyāsātpaṭuprajño vartate iti tathehāpi ya evābrahmasaṃsthāḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:3267: tathāca brahmasaṃstha iti yaugikaṃ padaṃ prakṛtaviṣayaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3268: yathā āgneyyāgnīdhramupatiṣṭhata ityatra viniyuktāpi prakṛtaivāgneyī gṛhyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3270: yadi hyatrāgnotyupadiśyeta tato yathā pratītā tathoddiśyeta /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3272: iha tu āgnīdhropasthāne sā vidheyatvena viniyujyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3278: tathehāpi prakṛtā evāśramā buddhiviparivartinaḥ parāmṛśyante nānuktaḥ parivrāḍeveti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3282: yatsaṃkhyākāśca ye prasiddhāste tatsaṃkhyākā eva kīrtyante iti cocitam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3284: aśādhāraṇenaikaikena lakṣaṇenaikeka āśramo vaktumupakrānta iti tathaiva samāpanamucitam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3286: naca tapo nāma nāsādhāraṇaṃ vānaprasthānāmityata āha-tapaścāsādhāraṇa iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3287: na khalu parākādibhiḥ kāyakleśapradhāno yathā vānaprasthastathā bhikṣuḥ satyapyaṣṭagrāsādiniyame /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3288: naca śaucasantoṣaśamadamādayastapaḥ pakṣe vartante tatra vṛddhānāṃ tapaḥprasiddherasiddheḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3292: traya eta iti kiṃ bhikṣurapi parāmṛśyate kintvā bhikṣuvarjaṃ traya eva /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3293: na tāvantraya iti bhikṣusaṃgrahe tadvarjanamete traya ityatra vartuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3294: eta iti prakṛtānāṃ sākalyena parāmarśādbhikṣusaṃgrahe ca na tasya puṇyalokatvamabrahmasaṃsthātvābhāvādbhikṣoḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3295: tena tasya brahmasaṃsthasya sadā puṇyalokatvamamṛtatvaṃ ceti virodhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3302: satyaṃ yaugikaḥ śabdaḥ sati prakṛtasaṃbhave na tadatipattyāprakṛte vartitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3303: asati tu saṃbhave mā bhūtpramādapāṭha ityaprakṛte vartayitavyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:3305: eṣa hi brahmasaṃsthatālakṣaṇo dharmo bhikṣorasādhāraṇa āśramāntarāṇi tatsaṃsthānyatatsaṃsthāni ca bhikṣustatsaṃstha ityeva /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3306: tatsaṃsthatā hi svābhāvaṃ vyavacchindantī virodhādyastatsaṃstha eva tatrāñjasī nānyatra /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3309: brahmasaṃsthatvamasādhāraṇaṃ parivrājakadharmaṃ śrutirādarśayatītyāha-tathāca nyāsa iti brahmeti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3310: sarvasaṅgaparityāgo hi nyāsaḥ sa brahmā kuta ityata āha-brahmā hi paraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3312: kimapekṣya paraḥ saṃnyāsa ityata āha-tāni vā etānyavarāṇi tapāṃsi nyāsa evātyarecayaditi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3314: tathā cedṛśaṃ nyāsalakṣaṇaṃ brahmasaṃsthatvaṃ bhikṣorevāsādhāraṇaṃ netareṣāmāśramiṇām /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3315: brahmajñānasya śabdajanitasya yaḥ paripākaḥ sākṣātkāro 'pavargasādhanaṃ tadaṅgatayā pārivrājyaṃ vihitam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3318: stutimātram upādānād iti cen nāpūrvatvāt / BBs_3,4.21 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3320: sa eṣa rasānāṃ rasatama ityādinā padasaṃdarbheṇaikavākyabhāvamupagataḥ stūyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3332: tenaikavākyatānupapatteḥ saṃnihitasya tūpāsanāvidheḥ kiṃ viṣayasamarpaṇenopayujyatāmuta stutyeti viśaye viṣayasamarpaṇena yathārthavattvaṃ naivaṃ stutyā bahiraṅgatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3343: sāmānyoktau tadviśeṣāḥ pacedityādayo 'pi gamyanta iti tatra kuryādityākṣiptakartṛkā bhāvanā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3346: evaṃ daṇḍī bhaveddaṇḍinā bhavitavyaṃ daṇḍinā bhūyetetyekadhātvarthaviṣayā vidhyupahitā bhāvanā udāhāryāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3348: yathā kulālavyāpārādghaṭo bhavati bījādaṅkuro bhavatīti prayuñjate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3354: pāriplavārthā iti cen na viśeṣitatvāt / BBs_3,4.23 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3355: yadyapi upaniṣadākhyānāni vidyāsaṃnidhau śrutāni tathāpi 'sarvāṇyākhyānāni pāriplave'iti sarvaśrutyā niḥśeṣārthatayā durbalasya saṃnidherbādhitatvātpāriplavārthānyevākhyānāni
GSP33brsvbh3u:3356: naca sarvā dāśatayīranubrūyāditi viniyoge 'pi dāśatayīnāṃ prātisvikaviniyogāttatra
GSP33brsvbh3u:3357: tatra karmaṇi yathā viniyogo na virudhyate tathehāpi satyapi pāriplave viniyege saṃnidhānādvidyāṅgatvamapi
GSP33brsvbh3u:3359: dāśatayīṣu prātisvikānāṃ viniyogānāṃ samudāyaviniyogasya ca tulyabalatvādiha tu saṃnidhānāt śruterbalīyastvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3361: kintu pāriplavamācakṣītetyupakramya yānyāmnātāni manurvaivasvato rājetyādīni teṣāmeva tatra viniyogaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:3366: yathā sarve brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyā ityatra nimantritāpekṣaḥ sarvaśabdaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3367: tathā copaniṣadākhyānānāṃ vidyāsaṃnidhirapratidvandīṃ vidyaikavākyatāṃ so 'rodīdityādīnāmiva vidyekavākyatvaṃ gamayatīti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3368: pratipattisaukaryāccetyupākhyānena hi bālā apyavadhīyante yathā tantropākhyāyikayeti //23//
GSP33brsvbh3u:3373: vidyāyāḥ kratvarthatve sati tathā kratūpakaraṇāya svakāryāya kraturapekṣitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3375: yadā tu puruṣārthā tadā nānayā kraturapekṣitaḥ svakārye nirapekṣāyā eva tasyāḥ sāmarthyāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3376: agnīndhānādinā cāśramakarmāṇyupalakṣyante tadāha-agnīndhanādīnyāśramakarmāṇi vidyayā svārthasiddhau nāpekṣitavyānīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3383: yathā svārthasiddhau nāpekṣyante āśramakarmāṇi evamutpattāvapi nāpekṣyeranniti śaṅkā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3393: caturthī sākṣātkāravatī vṛttirūpā nāntarīyakaṃ hi tasyāḥ kaivalyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3394: tatrādye tāvatpratipatti viditapadatadarthasya viditavākyagatigocaranyāyasya ca puṃsa upapadyete eveti na tatra karmāpekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3395: te eva ca cintāmayīṃ tṛtīyāṃ pratipattiṃ prasuvāte iti na tatrāpi karmāpekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3396: sā cādaranairantaryadīrghakālasevitā sākṣātkāravatīmādhatta eva pratipattiṃ caturthīmiti na tatrāpyasti karmāpekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3397: tannāntarīyakaṃ ca kaivalyamiti na tasyāpi karmāpekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3398: tadevaṃ pramāṇataśca prameyata utpattau ca kārye ca na jñānasya karmāpekṣeti bījaṃ śaṅkāyām /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3399: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-utpattau jñānasya karmāpekṣā vidyate vividiṣotpādadvārā 'vividiṣanti yajñena'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3401: yathā yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavatīti parṇamayatāvidhirapūrvatvānna tvayaṃ vartamānāpadeśaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:3407: sa hi tattvato 'nityāśuciduḥkhānātmani saṃsāre sati nityaśucimukhātmalakṣaṇena vibhrameṇa malinayati cittasattvamadharmanibandhanatvādvibhramāṇām
GSP33brsvbh3u:3408: ataḥ pāpmanaḥ prakṣaye pratyakṣopapattidvārāpāvaraṇe sati pratyakṣopapattibhyāṃ saṃsārasya tāttvikīmanityāśuciduḥkharūpatāmapratyūhaṃ viniścineti
GSP33brsvbh3u:3411: tato hānopāyaṃ paryeṣate paryeṣamāṇaścātmatattvajñānamasyopāya iti śāstrādācāryavacanāccopaśrutya tajjijñāsata iti vividiṣopahāramukhenātmajñānotpattāvasti karmāṇāmupayogaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3412: vividiṣuḥ khalu yukta ekāgratayā śravaṇamanane kartumutsahate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3415: yena bhāvanāyāṃ vā bhāvanākārye vā sākṣātkāre karmaṇāmupayogaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3419: dṛṣṭārtheṣu tu karmasu pratiṣiddhavarjanamanadhikāre 'pyasaktasya svārasikī pravṛttirupapadyata eva /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3421: ataśca 'bhrāntyā cellaukikaṃ karma vaidikaṃ ca tathāstu te'iti pralāpaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3423: upapāditaṃ caitadasmābhiḥ prathamasūtra ite neha punaḥ pratyāpyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3424: tasmādvividiṣotpādadvārāśramakarmaṇāṃ vidyotpattāvupayogo na vidyākārya iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3427: śamadamādyupetas syāt tathāpi tu tadvidhes tadaṅgatayā teṣām apy avaśyānuṣṭheyatvāt / BBs_3,4.27 / // 27 //
GSP33brsvbh3u:3429: sarvān nānumatiś ca prāṇātyaye taddarśanāt / BBs_3,4.28 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3431: eṣa kila vicāraviṣayaḥ-sarvāṇi khalu vāgādīnyavajitya prāṇo mukhya uvācaitāni kiṃ me 'nnaṃ bhaviṣyatīti, tāni hocuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3432: yadidaṃ loke 'nnamā ca śvabhya ā ca śakunibhyaḥ sarvaprāṇināṃ yadannaṃ tattavānnamiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3433: tadanena saṃdarbheṇa prāṇasya sarvamannamityanucintanaṃ vidhāyāha śrutiḥ-'na ha vā evaṃvidi kiñcanānannaṃ bhavati'iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3435: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimetatsarvānnābhyanujñānaṃ śamādivadetadvidyāṅgatayā vidhīyata uta stutyarthaṃ saṃkīrtyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3436: tatra yadyapi bhavatīti vartamānāpadeśānna vidhiḥ pratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3437: tathāpi yathā yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavatīti vartamānāpadeśādapi palāśamayītvavidhipratipattiḥ pañcamalakārāpattyā tathehāpi pravṛttiviśeṣakaratālābhe vidhipratipattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3438: stutau hi arthavādamātraṃ na tathārthavadyathā vidhau /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3439: bhakṣyābhakṣyaśāstraṃ ca sāmānyataḥ pravṛttamanena viśeṣaśāstreṇa bādhyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3440: gamyāgamyavivekaśāstramiva sāmānyataḥ pravṛttaṃ vāmadevavidyāṅgabhūtasamastastryaparihāraśāstreṇa viśeṣaviṣayeṇeti prāpta ucyate-aśakteḥ kalpanīyatvācchāstrāntaravirodhataḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:3442: na tāvatkauleyakamaryādamannaṃ manuṣyajātinā yugapatparyāyeṇa vā śakyamattum /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3444: na cātra liṅga iva sphuṭatarā vidhipratipattirasti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3447: naca satyāṃ gatau sāmānyataḥ pravṛttasya śāstrasya viṣayasaṃkoco yuktaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3450: prāṇātyaya iti cāvadhāraṇaparaṃ prāṇātyaya eva sarvānnatvam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3451: tatropākhyānācca sphuṭataravidhismṛteśca surāvarjaṃ vidvāṃsamavidvāṃsaṃ prati vidhānāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3459: kāmo ma udakapānamiti svātantryaṃ me udakapāne nadīkūpataḍāgaprāpādiṣu yathākāmaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:3460: prāpnomīti nocchiṣṭodakābhāve prāṇātyaya iti tatrocchiṣṭabhakṣaṇadoṣa iti maṭacīhateṣu
GSP33brsvbh3u:3477: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate-siddhe hi syādvirodho 'yaṃ na tu sādhye kathañcana /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3480: na tu sādhyarūpaṃ yathā ṣoḍaśina ekasya grahaṇāgrahaṇe /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3484: vidyāṅgatayā ca vidyāyāḥ kādācitkatayānavaśyaṃ bhāve 'pi 'kāmyo vā naimittiko vā nityamarthaṃ vikṛtya niviśate'iti nyāyādanityādhikāreṇa niviśamānamapi na nityamanityayati,
GSP33brsvbh3u:3485: tenāpi tatsiddheriti saṃyogapṛthaktvānna nityānityasaṃyogavirodha ekasya kāryasyeti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3486: sahakāritvaṃ ca karmaṇāṃ na kārye vidyāyāḥ kiṃ tūtpattau /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3489: yathā 'sahaiva daśabhiḥ pūtrairbhāraṃ vahati gardabhī'iti sātsveva daśaputreṣu saiva bhārasya vāhiketi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3494: catasṛṇāmapi ca pratipattīnāṃ brahmaṇi vidhānānupapatterityuktaṃ prathamasūtre /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3495: draṣṭavyo nididhyāsitavya iti ca vidhisarūpaṃ na vidhirityapyuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3498: naca svaṃ rūpaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sādhyaṃ nityatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3504: yathā māsamagnihotraṃ juhvatīti prakaraṇāntarātkarmabheda evamihāpi 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena
GSP33brsvbh3u:3506: ivyavacchede sati karmāntaramiti prāpta ucyate-satyapi prakaraṇāntare tadeva karma,
GSP33brsvbh3u:3507: śruteḥ smṛteśca saṃyogabhedaḥ paraṃ yathā 'agnihotraṃ juhuyātsvargakāmaḥ' 'yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juhuyāt'iti tadevāgnihotramubhayasaṃyuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3509: kintu ajñātajñāpanasvaraso vidhiḥ prakaraṇaikye sphuṭatarapratyabhijñābalena svarasaṃ jahyāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3511: iha tu siddhavadutpannarūpāṇyeva yajñādīni vividiṣāyāṃ viniyuñjāno na juhvatītyādivadapūrvameṣāṃ rūpamutpādayitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3515: kāle hi karma vidhīyate na karmaṇi kāla ityutsargaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3516: iha tu vividiṣāyāṃ vidhiśrutiḥ na yajñādau /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3523: yadi vidyāsahakārīṇyāśramakarmāṇi hanta bho vidhurādīnāmanāśramiṇāmanadhikāro vidyāyām,
GSP33brsvbh3u:3532: yadyapi ceha janmani karmāṇyananuṣṭhitāni tathāpi vividiṣātiśayadarśanātprāci bhave 'nuṣṭhitāni tairiti gamyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3533: nanu yathādhītaveda eva dharmajijñāsāyāmadhikriyate nānadhītaveda iha janmani /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3534: tatheha janmanyāśramakarmotpāditavividiṣa eva vidyāyāmadhikṛto netara ityanāśramiṇāmanadhikāro vidhuraprabhṛtīnāmityata āha-dṛṣṭārthā ceti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3543: atas tv itarajjyāyo liṅgāc ca / BBs_3,4.39 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3546: daivātpunaḥ patnyādiviyogātaḥ satyanāśramitve bhavedadhikāro vidyāyāmiti śrutismṛtisaṃdarbheṇa vividiṣanti yajñenetyādinā jyāyastvāvagateḥ śrutiliṅgātsmṛtiliṅgāccāvagamyate
GSP33brsvbh3u:3550: tadbhūtasya tu nātadbhāvo jaiminer api niyamāt tadrūpābhāvebhyaḥ / BBs_3,4.40 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3556: abhāvaṃ śiṣṭācārābhāvaṃ vibhajate-na caivamācārāḥ śiṣṭā iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3559: na cādhikārikam api patanānumānāt tadayogāt / BBs_3,4.41 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3560: prāyaścittaṃ na paśyāmīti naiṣṭhikaṃ prati prāyaścittābhāvasmaraṇānnairṛtagardabhālambhaḥ prāyaścittamupakurvāṇakaṃ prati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3561: tasmācchinnaśirasa iva puṃsaḥ pratikriyābhāva iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3562: sūtrayojanā tu-na cādhikārikamadhikāralakṣaṇe prathamakāṇḍe nirṇītam 'avakīrṇipaśuśca tadvadādhānasyāprāptakālatvāt'ityanena yatprāyaścittaṃ tanna naiṣṭhike bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3565: upapūrvam api tv eke bhāvamaśanavat tad uktam / BBs_3,4.42 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3568: tasyāmapi ca sākṣātprāyaścittaṃ na kartavyamiti prāyaścittaniṣedho na gamyate,
GSP33brsvbh3u:3570: tathā ca smṛtirniṣedhārtheti anumāya tadarthā śrutiranumātavyā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3574: sūtrārthastu-upapūrvamapi pātakaṃ naiṣṭhikasyāvakīrṇitvaṃ na mahāpātakamapirevakārārthe ata eke prāyaścittabhāvamicchantīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3576: śāstrasthā yā vā prasiddhiḥ sā grāhyā śāstramūlatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3580: bahis tūbhayathāpi smṛter ācārāc ca / BBs_3,4.43 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3581: yadi naiṣṭhikādīnāmasti prāyaścittaṃ tatkimetaiḥ kṛtanirṇejanaiḥ saṃvyavahartavyamuta neti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3582: tatra doṣakṛtatvādasaṃvyavahārasya prāyaścittena tannibarhaṇādanibarhaṇo vā tatkaraṇavaiyarthyātsaṃvyavahāryā eveti prāpta ucyate-bahistūbhayathāpi smṛterācārācca /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3583: niṣiddhakarmānuṣṭhānajanyameno lokadvaye 'pyaśuddhimāpādayati dvaidham kasyacidenaso lokadvaye 'pyaśuddhirapanīyate prāyaścittairenonibarhaṇaṃ kurvāṇaiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3584: kasyācittu paralokāśuddhimātramapanīyate prāyaścittairenonibarhaṇaṃ kurvāṇairihalokāśuddhistvenasāpāditā na śakyāpanetum /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3588: bālaghnādistu kṛtanirṇejano 'pi vacanādavyavahārya iha loke jāyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3593: prathame kāṇḍe śeṣalakṣaṇe tathākāma ityatrartviksaṃbandhe karmaṇaḥ siddhe kiṃ kāmo
GSP33brsvbh3u:3594: yājamāna utārtvijya iti saṃśayyārtvijye 'pi karmaṇi yājamāna eva kāmo guṇaphaleṣviti
GSP33brsvbh3u:3595: nirṇītamiha tvevañjātīyakāni cāṅgasaṃbaddhāni upāsanāni kiṃ yājamānanyevotārtvijyānīti
GSP33brsvbh3u:3599: vacane yajamānasya phalavadupāsanaṃ tasya phalaśruteḥ taṃ ha bako dālbhyo vidāñcakāretyāderupāsanasya
GSP33brsvbh3u:3602: ārtvijyam ity auḍulomiḥ tasmai hi parikrīyate / BBs_3,4.45 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3605: na cartvikkartṛka upāsane yajamānagāmitā phalasyāsaṃbhavinī tena hi sa parikrītastadgāmino phalāya ghaṭate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3610: sahakāryantaravidhiḥ pakṣeṇa tṛtīyaṃ tadvato vidhyādivat / BBs_3,4.47 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3612: labdhvā bālyena tiṣṭhāsedbālyaṃ ca pāṇḍityaṃ ca nirvidyātha muniramaunaṃ ca maunaṃ ca nirvidyātha brāhmaṇa iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3613: yatra hi vidhivibhaktiḥ śrūyate sa vidheyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3614: bālyena tiṣṭhāsedityatra ca sā śrūyate na śrūyate tu maune /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3617: tasmādbrāhṇaḥ pāṇḍityaṃ nirvidyeti pāṇḍityavidhānādeva maunasiddheḥ pāṇḍityameva maunamiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3618: athavā bhikṣuvacano 'yaṃ muniśabdastatra darśanāt 'gārhasthyamācāryakulaṃ maunaṃ vānaprastham'ityatra /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3620: tasmādbālyamevātra vidhīyate maunaṃ tu prāptaṃ praśaṃsārthamanūdyata iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3622: api tu jñānamātraṃ pāṇḍityaṃ jñānātiśayasaṃpattistu maunaṃ tatraiva tatprasiddheḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3624: tasmādapūrvatvānmaunasya bālyapāṇḍityāpekṣayā tṛtīyamidaṃ maunaṃ jñānātiśayarūpaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3625: evaṃ ca nirvedanīyatvamapi vidhāna āñjasaṃ syādityāha-nirvedanīyatvanirdeśāditi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3626: kasyedaṃ maunaṃ vidhīyate vidyāsahakāritayetyata āha-tadvato vidyāvataḥ saṃnyāsinobhikṣoḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3634: api tu vidyodayāyābhyāso pravṛtto na punarutpannavidyātiśayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3637: ata eva samidādirvidhyantaḥ sa hi vidhiḥ pradhānavidheḥ paścāditi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3640: nanu yadyayamāśramo bālyapradhānaḥ kasmātpunargārhasthyenopasaṃharatīti codayati-evaṃ bālyādiviśiṣṭeti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3643: chāndogye bahulāyāsasādhyakarmabahulatvādgārhasthyasya cāśramāntaradharmāṇāṃ ca keṣāñcidahiṃsādīnāṃ samavāyāttenopasaṃhāro na punastena samāpanādityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:3645: evaṃ tadāśramadvayopanyāsena kvacitkadāciditarābhāvaśaṅkā mandabuddheḥ syāditi tadapākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram-
GSP33brsvbh3u:3647: vṛttirvānaprasthānāmanekavidhairevaṃ brahmācāriṇo 'pīti vṛttibhedo 'nuṣṭhātāro vā puruṣā bhidyante,
GSP33brsvbh3u:3655: evaṃ ca śāstrāntarābādhenāpyupapattau na śāstrāntarabādhanamanyāyyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti //50//
GSP33brsvbh3u:3659: kiṃ śravaṇādibhirihaiva vā janmani vidyā sādhyate utāniyama iha vāmutra veti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3660: yadyapi karmāṇi yajñādīnyaniyataphalāni teṣāṃ ca vidyotpādasādhanatvena vidyotpādasyāniyamaḥ pratibhāti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3661: tathāca garbhasthasya vāmadevasyātmapratibodhaśravaṇāt 'anekajanmasaṃsiddhastato yāti parāṃ gatim'iti ca smaraṇādāmuṣmikatvamapyavagamyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3665: naca pramāṇeṣu pravartamānāḥ pramātāra aihikamapi cirabhāvinaṃ pramotpādaṃ kāmayante kintu tādātvikameva prāgeva tu pāralaukikam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3666: nahi kumbhalādidṛkṣuścakṣuṣī samunmīlayati kālāntarīyāya kumbhadarśanāya kintu tādātvikāya /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3668: śrutismṛtī ca pāralaukikaṃ vidyotpādaṃ stutyā brūtaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3670: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-yata evātra vidyotpāde śravaṇādibhiḥ kartavye yajñādīnāṃ sattvaśuddhidvāreṇa
GSP33brsvbh3u:3671: vā vighnopaśamadvārā vopayogo 'ta eva teṣāṃ yajñādīnāṃ karmāntarapratibandhāpratibandhābhyāmaniyataphalatvena
GSP33brsvbh3u:3674: tathāca teṣāṃ yajñādyapekṣāṇāṃ teṣāṃ cāniyataphalatvena śravaṇādīnāmapyaniyataphalatvaṃ yuktamevaṃ śrutismṛtipratibandho na stutimātratvena vyākhyeyo bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3675: puruṣāśca vidyārthinaḥ sādhanasāmarthyānusāreṇa tadanurūpameva kāmayiṣyante tadidamuktam-abhisaṃdherniraṅkuśatvāditi //51//
GSP33brsvbh3u:3679: tathā ca yathā sādhanotkarṣanikarṣābhyāṃ tatphalasya vidyāyā utkarṣanikarṣāvevaṃ vidyāphalasyāpi mukterutkarṣanikarṣau saṃbhāvyete /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3680: naca muktāvaihikāmuṣmikatvalakṣaṇo viśeṣa upapadyate brahmopāsanāparipākalabdhajanmani vidyāyāṃ jīvato mukteravaśyaṃbhāvaniyamātsatyapyārabdhavipākakarmāprakṣaye
GSP33brsvbh3u:3683: mukterapi vidyāphalatvādrūpataścotkarṣanikarṣau syātāmiti prāpata ucyate-na muktestatra
GSP33brsvbh3u:3686: naca muktirbrahmaṇo nityasvarūpāvasthānalakṣaṇā nityā satī sādhyā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3687: naca savāsananiḥśeṣakleśakarmāśayaprakṣayo vidyājanma {FN 1-virodhikāryodaya eva pūrvapradhvasaṃ iti matamāśritya kleśādikṣayo vidyājanmeti sāmānādhikaraṇyam /}
GSP33brsvbh3u:3690: naca cirācirotpādānutpādāvantareṇa vidyāyāmapi rūpato bhedaḥ kaścidupalakṣyate tasyā apyekarūpatvena śruteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3692: na cātra vidyātvaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3694: tasmāttasyā muktyavasthāyā aikarūpyāvadhṛtermuktilakṣaṇasya phalasyāviśeṣo yukta iti //52//
GSP33brsvbh3u:3695: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ tṛtīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
